Slaughter your way through an array of vicious opponents while gaining riches, power and glory. Crush your enemies, watch them beg for death and hear the cries of their women! 
 
 
Create the ultimate warrior 
Take your barbarian gladiator from the humble beginnings of the arena to verge of god-hood. In Doom Warrior there is literally no limit to how powerful you can become and with so many stats and abilities to choose from the number of viable character builds are endless. 
 
Forge your destiny, and your gear! 
Doom Warrior takes character customization to a whole new level. All pieces of equipment can be reforged into a design of your choosing. Create a masterpiece from hundreds of individual parts, which can be combined in several million different ways. 
 
	 
Live or die 
In Doom Warrior you hold the power of life or death. Do you execute your defeated opponent and risk incurring the wrath of his allies? Or do you show mercy in the hope of breaking the cycle of violence? Which-ever path you choose, the consequences will be serious and far reaching. 
 
An epic journey 
Embark on a journey spanning the breadth of the globe. From the rotting desert slum of Ras Khalat, to the frozen Blackfells and the sweltering jungles of Raktul; take part in an epic tale of power, corruption and lust. Will you fight to protect the weak, or see the rivers run red with the blood of the innocent?

summary: Henry Baker is a normal guy. Really. So after another day of work, it's your job to help him go through his evening and finally go to bed. Easy, right?

name: Doomsday Racers

name: Doorbell Game!

name: Double the Meat
summary: Double the Meat is a bundle package of the games Burgers 1 and Burgers 2.

name: Doraemon no Study Boy: Kuku Game
summary: Doraemon no Study Boy: Kuku Game is a Japanese Game Boy Color game.

name: Don't Die, Mr. Robot!
summary: Mr. Robot loves fruit! But whenever he tries to eat one it explodes.

name: Don't Touch Anything Red
summary: Fast gameplay and 5 player multiplayer! Just don't forget one thing... Don't Touch Anything Red!

name: Dorei Same
summary: An erotic top-down adventure game about a woman who lost everything and now has to adjust to her new life as a slave for a noble's daughter. Explore the castle and figure out a way to escape the lustful maiden.

name: Double Time Dash
summary: Horses

name: Dodd Goes To The Museum
summary: Explore Dodd's local museum in this short, casual and relaxing adventure! Visit various exhibits within the museum's four wings and talk to various characters along the way!

name: Downpurr
summary: A cutesy platformer-shooter about magic, cats, and rain.

name: Door4: Ultimatum
summary: Dive into the captivating world of puzzles with the new part of the Door game series. Your task is to find the correct door among many options to advance to the next level. But be careful: only by understanding the patterns and solving puzzles you can unlock the coveted passage.

name: Donkey Kong 3
summary: A planned Mini Classics version of Donkey Kong 3 was in the works, but never got released. In a stock image, it is mislabeled as Donkey Kong Junior.

name: Dominion: Intrigue - 1st Edition
summary: Play with Secret Chamber, Great Hall, Coppersmith, Scout, Saboteur and Tribute in this set of cards that were included in the original release of Intrigue.

name: Dominion: Prosperity
summary: This is the 4th expansion to the game of Dominion. It adds 25 new Kingdom cards, 2 new Basic cards that let players keep building up past Gold and Province. The central theme is wealth; there are treasures with abilities, cards that interact with treasures, and powerful expensive cards.

name: Don't Take This Risk
summary: An emotionally disturbed individual calls the suicide hotline and the player has to calm him down.

name: Do It for Me
summary:
Do It For Me is a sidescroller horror platform game.
The original version of this game was made for the Brackeys Game Jam #2.
This is an updated version released as a full game on itch.io.
Multiple endings.

name: DodoGo! Challenge
summary: Danger still lurks on Domo Island in this brand new instalment of DodoGo! Challenge.

name: Double Play
summary: "Double Play" is a visual novel for adults only. A young slacker named David moves into his late grandmother's house, where he meets the charming female neighbors, but one innocent prank turns his life upside down.

name: DOX: A Puzzle Game
summary: DOX is an original puzzle game in which you must learn the unique rules of each button type to remove them all from the grid. Tap, drag, swap, fill, destroy, and erase your way through story mode, then hone your DOX skills with endless puzzle mode.

name: Don't Touch Red!!
summary: Just tap the screen to bounce the ball. Avoid red obstacles, check your reflex, plan your path.

name: Dooors
summary: Unravel mysteries to escape from rooms! Get your brain ready to open some doors!

name: Dog And Goblin
summary: A fantasy deck-building strategy game. Your items and minions have transformed into card symbols. They interact with each others and automaticly fight to beat human army. Choose your cards, build a strong army and destroy human's fort!

name: Donkey Kong 64: Tag Anywhere
summary: A mod for Donkey Kong 64 which makes it possible to change characters anywhere, changing how the exploration and collectibles affect gameplay.

name: Dominion: Hinterlands
summary: Hinterlands is 6th expansion to Dominion. It adds 26 new Kingdom cards to Dominion, including 20 Actions, 3 Treasures, 3 Victory cards, and 3 Reactions. The central theme is cards that do something immediately when you buy them or gain them.

name: Doge Dimensions
summary: Blast through the Doge Dimensions and explore the multiverse in this open world adventure. Fly, dash, and defy gravity as you discover unknown terrain and take on a variety of challenges.

name: Doom
summary: The 3DO version of Doom was very compromised because of its development cycle. It was based on the previous Atari Jaguar port.

name: Doomed to Hell
summary: Doomed to Hell is a roguelike-like top-down shooter where you play as Rose, a human in hell who will need to fight all of its monsters in waves of enemies, defeat bosses, and get new weapons to earn back his life on earth.

name: Downforce
summary: A group of drivers and teams have split from the Formula 1 Championship, after being held back by rules and regulations for too long. Races have become boring with overtaking and pure racing at an all-time low. The new racing league has been condemned as too dangerous and banned from using circuits around the world. The races instead take place in and around major cities. The cars use all the technology available today, to increase speed and `downforce?. With less stringent rules, teams have worked in different directions creating a wide variety of enhanced super cars.

name: Dodge 2
summary: Bullet hell with the mouse.

name: Double Point
summary: A pattern matching game.

name: Doraemon 2: Animal Wakusei Densetsu
summary: A Doraemon action game for Game Boy.

name: Do Dishes As Spencer
summary: This is how spencer does dishes because he is over 6ft.

name: Doghouse 2
summary:
You find yourself in your backyard yet again with the same goal: constructing the perfect doghouse. But this time, things get even crazier than they were last time.
This game has five endings in total.

name: Dominions 5: Warriors of the Faith
summary: A turn based strategy game.

name: Double Bloob
summary: Blob-like beings have kidnapped a dolphin and it is up to you to rescue him!

name: Dog!
summary: A GAME BY ITS COVER 2020

name: Dolphy Dash
summary:
Looking for cutest endless swimmer? You found one!
You’re in deep water now!
Join playful dolphin “Dolphy” on his remarkable journey through beautiful yet dangerous oceans! Dodge & dash underwater creatures to collect fish coins and unlock Dolphy’s friends: mysterious Mage, swift Ballerina, slower but elegant Gentleman and many others! Power-ups give you the advantage but are you better swimmer than your friends? Join this cute arcade game for new adventure in ocean!
This cute dolphin game will entertain and relax you in your free time. Enjoy delightful visuals and relaxing sounds during the gameplay. It is easy to play, but will you be able to master it?

name: Domination Wars
summary: Enjoy tiny huge battles and dominate the enemy. Set up your strategy deck, chop some wood, build your barracks and raise an army in this fast paced RTS!

name: Downhill OMG 2
summary: Race downhill, earn XP, shoot enemies, and upgrade equipment.

name: Doctor Who: Clockwork Quest
summary: Seven crystals have been hidden in different time zones - scan each zone and press the space bar to retrieve them. Use your mouse to freeze the other robots and collect the keys they leave behind to re-wind your own robot.

name: DodoGo!
summary: DodoGo! for DSiWare

name: Dominion: Base Set - 1st Edition
summary: Play with Chancellor, Woodcutter, Feast, Spy, Thief, and Adventurer in this set of cards that were included in the original release of the Base game.

name: Don't Mess with Gamers
summary: A new survival horror game

name: Doki Doki Fallen Angel
summary: In an alternate universe where Monika is not self-aware, our protagonist finds himself growing closer to Yuri. Soon however, he discovers what this girl is hiding from the outside world. The other girls problems start to appear as well, as they progress within the overarching narrative of Yuri and our protagonist's relationship. Fallen Angel is a story that is meant to tug and pull on many different emotions. It'll allow you to help Yuri overcome her self harm, anxiety, and insecurities. The story will swing from wholesome and heartfelt, to soul crushing sadness. With new artworks and music to help you lose yourself in the story and help create an experience you won't soon forget.Do you have what it takes to save... a Fallen Angel?

name: Dora the Explorer: Dora's Fix-it Adventure
summary: Help Dora and Boots find the missing parts of the Air-Car-Boat-Mobile. Watch out for Swiper!

name: Doctor Who: Legacy
summary: A free-to-play mobile game based on the long running science fiction show, Doctor Who. Available on Android and iOS, it was developed by Tiny Rebel Games.

name: Dominus Galaxia: KS Edition
summary: 4X space strategy with tactical combat, spiritual sequel to Master of Orion.

name: Doggoland
summary: A small exploration game

name: Dokapon DX: Wataru Sekai ha Oni Darake
summary: Dokapon DX is a Japan-only RPG/Board game hybrid, the first of these in the Dokapon series and appeared on the Nintendo Gamecube and Sony Playstation 2.

name: Don't Fall Asleep
summary: A short, mini-shooter inspired by all-nighters and meant to be played in quick runs. Rapid gear progression and powerful consumable items are matched by swarms of ever-increasing enemies. No extra lives--falling asleep is game over.

name: Don't Look
summary: Don't Look is a horror game where you are being hunted by things that can only move when you see them. With no explanation or recollection of where you came from your only objective is to survive and make it out of that hell and hopefully uncover some secrets on the way.

name: Double Breakout
summary: Double Breakout combines Breakout with Pong.

name: Double Stretch
summary: Double Stretch - an unusual top down flight shooter.

name: Doki Doki AI Interrogation
summary: A short interrogation game that fully utilizes the popular conversational AI, ChatGPT! You become a [competent police officer], interrogating an [AI] suspect in a murder case. The choice of interrogation words is yours. The [AI]'s responses are generated in real time by ChatGPT.

name: DodecaDragons
summary: DodecaDragons is an incremental game created by Demonin. DodecaDragons utilizes stacking layers of prestige systems to use player's resources, and keep them relevant through the entire game.

name: Doughbee
summary: A real time wave based roguelike about battling doodle creatures and collecting perks along the way, with ranging effects from elemental damage to things like rammer Doughbee and even a scorpion mech, see how far you can make it through this bullet hell of a nightmare.

name: Double Dragon 3: The Arcade Game
summary: The original martial arts adventure continues - all the hard-hitting arcade action is at your command! Battle your way across the globe with awesome special moves and lethal weapons straight from the arcade! Whether it's a swirling Hurricane Kick or a staggering One Armed Head Butt, you have what it takes to crush ruthless enemies in the Double Dragon adventure of a lifetime! Battle across America, China, Japan and Italy to your ultimate challenge in Egypt!

name: Double View
summary: Can you handle this mind-blowing experience? Control two squares across screens with different layouts and try to reach the finish line without hitting any walls or obstacles. Double View is a unique game that will push your concentration and motor skills to a whole new level. Test yourself!

name: Dontrel Dolphin
summary: May Dolphin is in trouble, and Dontrel must save her. Travel across treacherous landscapes as you fight and dodge your way to victory. Use Cannon Caliber, the magical sword, to aid Dontrel during his quest.

name: Dokoda
summary: DOKODA is a hidden-object puzzle game set in 18th-century Japan. Players assume the role of Komaru, a recent recruit at the Museum of World Civilizations. Komaru's mission is to venture back in time to Edo Period Japan and retrieve a variety of artifacts to give mankind a new hope for the future.

name: Doko Demo Raku Raku! DS Kakeibo
Dodge Racing: Charger vs Challenger
summary: Rev your engines and hit the highways and byways of the USA in the ultimate racing tournament. Dodge Racing: Charger vs. Challenger pits two of the mostic American vehicles in a Battle Royale to determine which one is the greatest muscle car of all time. Burn rubber and peel out in your Dodge Charger or Dodge Challenger, pushing these bad boys to the limits to win Championship Points for your team

name: Dora & Kai-Lan's Pet Shelter
summary: Two heroic Nickelodeon stars are teaming up like never before to find new homes for pets in need. Its Dora and Kai-lan's Pet Shelter! With help from Kai-lan's grandfather YeYe and Dora's cousin Diego, Dora & Kai-Lan invite kids to help them at their Pet Shelter where they care for puppies, kittens, bunnies, and birds. Dora and Kai-lan's Pet Shelter helps pets get clean, fed, healthy, and happy so they can be adopted! Once pets are adopted, they aren't gone for good because Dora and Kai-lan need your help to run a daycare for returning animals too!

name: Dontrel Dolphin
summary: An action game made with Game Maker 8

name: Downbass Warriors: Heroes of Maydamn
summary: DownBass Warriors: Heroes of MayDamn (DWHOM) is a hardcore first-person shooter with nice physics, a trouble-free, enjoyable shooting and an advanced character injury systems. A unique, one of a kind character armor customization system was also introduced in the game . So what are you waiting for?

name: Double Dragon
summary: A handheld electronic device based on Taito's Double Dragon arcade game. It was released in 1989.

name: Doctor Klyvinski
summary: Play as a doctor in the communist country Kolinisav, diagnose over 30 different unique diseases and treat your patients with 20 different medicines while avoiding the rage of the commissar and the greed of the underworld.

name: Dong Dong Never Die
summary:
Dong Dong Never Die is a 2D fighting game featuring the most rare fighters we have ever seen.

We can find a lolita, a Chinese with Afro hair, a prayer and even Super Mario.

Each character features different styles and own kicks, punches and special movements.

This means that if you choose Super Mario you can throw mushrooms, but when using other characters you can use an umbrella, enlarge arms or any other crazy movement.

Settings are also special, always in movement and we can fight in the scenario of Super Mario or Streets of Rage taken directly from the original ones.

Dong Dong Never Die is as rare as funny, so we recommend it. Don't worry about Chinese language, just press enter and continue.

name: Doomsday Jetlag
summary: Arcade shooter at the end of the world! Play as fighter pilots fending off the aerial hordes of hell during total nuclear apocalypse, Doomsday Jetlag combines casual bullet-hell, shoot-em-up & rogue-lite elements to maximise the fun of playing through armageddon!

name: Don't Bug Me!
summary: A puzzle game about annoying people made for Github Game Off 2021. Fill up the Bugged-o-meter and search for collectable bugs!

name: Dotokoi
summary: 好感度が上がると解像度も上がっていく乙女ゲーム。全編フルボイス

name: Dose Response
summary: Dose Response is a roguelike game where you play an addict. Avoid the dangers threatening your mind and body while desperately looking for the next fix.

name: Doraemon: Nobita to Midori no Kyojin-den DS
summary: A Doraemon 2D platformer for the Nintendo DS.

name: Doraemon: Nobita no Shin Makai Daibouken DS
summary: A Doraemon-themed card battle game for the Nintendo DS.

name: Don't Find Me!!
summary: Dive into horror with Don't Find Me!!, where your mission is to survive by collecting 6 books while avoiding the lurking monsters. Keep your cool and your flashlight on to hope for escape. Are you ready to face your fears in this terrifying nightmare?

name: Double Clutch
summary: Double Clutch is a top-down racing game developed for the Sega Mega Drive. It was only released in PAL regions.

name: Doupleri
summary: A chill game about destroying blocks with symbols.

name: Downton Abbey: Mysteries of the Manor
summary: Downton Abbey has been robbed, and in this hidden object game the player must help set the Abbey to rights and catch the culprit.

name: Doll Defenders
summary: You were teleported to Male Doll's multiverse with one goal: to save the heroes of our games. However, you may fall in love with them along the way and get the happy final ending you deserve. Are you looking to save the world, or the love of one hot man that’s everything you ever wanted? Don't lie!

name: Dot Runner: Complete Edition
summary: A dot-eating maze game in the Picdun series.

name: Dooblets
summary: This adventure supports 2 - 4 players! Play through 4 unique worlds filled with challenges and puzzles with your friends!

name: Doomsday Dispute
summary: Doomsday Dispute introduces a post-apocalypse world where you need to survive and find other survivors to start a new civilization.

name: Doraemon: Nobita no Nankyoku Kachikochi Daibouken
summary: A 3DS game based on the 37th Doraemon theatrical film.

name: Door Knocker
summary:
There's only one door. 
 
It's time to place door and kick door, and that's all I do.

name: Double Cubes
summary: Year 2097. You are a cyborg soldier, a member of Elite Military Forces. Your objective is to complete first step of checking your brain potential in the virtual room. You must act accurately and fast, not to make mistakes and pass through the whole course. Failure is not an option.

name: Don't Remember
summary: In Don’t Remember, some things are better left forgotten. Fight your amnesia in this atmospheric, first person psychological horror game. Solve the mystery of the old mansion in 1900’s England through the use of your lantern’s various colors and face its hidden grotesque visage.

name: D.O.A.S.: Department of Applied Science
summary: Escape the parallel dimension, and find your way back.

name: Don Juan
summary: Adult adventure game developed by DB-Soft in 1984.

name: Dokkaebi Hentai Adventures
summary: You play for anime-girl with an unusual name Dokkaebi, which hit the strange world after watching the anime-title, and you need to get out of this world, along the way, collecting lolly faces. Warning, in the world live chickens.

name: Dora and the Three Little Pigs
Doki Doki Card League
summary: Doki Doki Card League is a turn based, single player, manga card battle, strategy game for baseball enthusiasts.

name: Dots & Boxes
summary:
Are you looking for a game that brings absolute fun into your life? Well, we have got to tell you that we know about one such game! Want to know? It’s Dots & Boxes.
Dots & Boxes is a multiplayer game that reminds you of your golden childhood days. Yes, this is the very game that has played a big part in our school lives. We want you to hark back to your childhood by playing this game digitally which is created with appealing features and design.

name: Don't Lie Pack 1
summary: Collection of epic games where sincerity is the key to conquer Do you dare to face this memorization game?

name: Don Pan
summary: Game for Tomy Pyuta, TRS-80 and MSX.

name: Dooors VR
summary:
"Dooors VR" is stage clear type real escape content.
Solve the mystery hidden in the room, use the item, open the door and complete all the stages!

name: Doki Doki Corrupted Files
summary: With the files corrupted, and a looming threat on the loose, our crew find themselves in a precarious situation. Set during a decaying act 4, you'll witness a short story that introduces brand new concepts to the all-too well-known story of the Literature Club.

name: Donkey Kong Jr.
summary: Donkey Kong Jr. is a Tabletop, and Panorama Game & Watch game. The Tabletop and Panorama versions are the same, though there is a New Wide Screen game under the same name, which is different.

name: Dora the Explorer: The Search for Pirate Pig's Treasure
summary: Pirate Pig has lost his treasure, and only Dora and Boots can find it for him! But they'll need a little help from their friends, Map, Backpack, and, of course, you! Backpack has everything that you'll need to help you get past many challenging and silly obstacles! But keep an eye out for Swiper the fox... that sneaky fox will swipe what you need for the adventure!

name: Doomsday Dreamgirl
summary: Doomsday Dreamgirl is a kinetic visual novel. You're left staring at a stranger whom you've invited into the safety of your home for the final countdown. Is the end of the world even worth crying about? Surely not? But her tears keep telling you otherwise.

name: Dogfight: Battle in the Skies
summary: A German 2D flight simulator Dogfight: Battle in the skies, Is a fast paced, action, side-scrolling game.

name: Doodler
summary: Create, Play, Share! Doodler is a puzzle platformer with a powerful map editor and workshop support that allows you to create levels to share with the world!

name: Doom EXP
summary: A xp/rank/reward/mobility modification with visual/sound/text notifications. Custom "Doom Exp Settings" menu, Improved Sounds & effects and More Gore!

name: Doctor Who: Dalek Hack
summary:
A game included as part of the "Doctor Who and the micro:bit". An educational series of videos meant to teach basic coding.

A link has been created to the Dalek Spaceship computer network and the Doctor has prepared a fake Dalek with a micro:bit installed inside. By coding in JavaScript, Python or using Blocks, you must navigate the Dalek through each level until you save the universe from the Reality Bomb.

name: Doodlebug: Bug Bash II
summary:
Doodlebug is a side-scrolling platform sequel to Bug Bash. Your aim as the "Doodlebug" is to make your way through five different levels (with three sub-levels each), killing baddies by jumping on their heads until you eventually make it to the final baddie.

The most unique thing about this game is the novel theme at its centre: You can choose between five different coloured pencils to throw at your baddies (presuming you've picked some up). If the pencil's flight path is uninterrupted then they'll draw a useful item for you: Either an Umbrella (for long falls), Ball (to be able to jump onto higher platforms), a Potion (invincibility), a Clock (stops time) and an Eraser (kills everything on screen).

name: Don't Screw Up!
summary:
Let me show you a minimalistic game «Don`t screw up!». Whether you are looking for something serious or just want to kill some time by tap and swipe, this game is simple and addictive from the very first minute. Want to play? First, let me tell you something.
Do you think you can handle mocking and cruelty? Want to play nasty or want to play nice? It’s your choice. I’m just the moderator, a real sweet-pea, an occasionally cranky game-minder, a vicious, teeth-baring attack-dog… neatly rolled into one.

name: Dominos Pro
summary: Enhanced version of Domino game (also known as All Fives) with statistics, five levels of difficulty and customizable game options.

name: Dominus
summary:
Dominus is a strategy game developed by Visual Concepts and published by U.S. Gold, originally released for IBM PCs in 1994. Conversions to the Sega Mega Drive and SNES were in development around this time and were set to be published by Asciiware. However, for unknown reasons, both versions were cancelled.

A prototype ROM of the Mega Drive version, dated 1993, has since been unearthed, showing an incomplete game without any sound.

name: Doraemon: Yume Dorobou to 7-nin no Gozans
summary:
Doraemon: Yume Dorobou to 7-nin no Gozans is a 1993 platformer by Sega for the Sega Mega Drive tying into the Doraemon media franchise.

B jumps. C shoots your gun, which stuns enemies so you can safely jump on them and use them as platforms. The longer you hold C, the more powerful your shots get; sufficiently powerful shots can destroy enemies.

name: Donkey Kong Country: Competition Cartridge
summary:
The Donkey Kong Country Competition Cartridge is a cut-down competition variant of Donkey Kong Country manufactured for use in the Nintendo PowerFest '94 game competition and later featured in the Blockbuster World Video Game Championships II event. Following the end of the later contest, copies of the Competition cartridge were sold in a Nintendo Power subscribers catalogue. Due to its rarity (the back insert states the print run was of 2,500 copies), the game has become a prized collector item.

The actual game consists of a few select levels from Donkey Kong Country with the addition of a point counter and a few minor tweaks to encourage scoring, the goal being to score as many points as possible. The tree house and banana cave at the start of Jungle Hijinxs have been disabled and all of the animal tokens in the early levels have been replaced with banana bunches, making it impossible to reach the bonus round without the usage of a cheating device. The player is also given 50 starting extra lives instead of the 5 as in the original game. The game has a time limit of five minutes, which is displayed at the center of the screen. After the allotted time, the game freezes.

name: Dominus Rage
summary: Beat 'Em Up is a game in traditions of the old masters. Fight alone or with a company and beat up all your foes. Dominus feels that the Tavor has come back to life again. He returns to Altran, where his enimies are waiting for him.

name: Don't Go in the Old Greene House
summary: Play as Lisa, a teenager who must spend an hour in a haunted house on Halloween, and ends up bartering with the ghosts inside to escape.

name: Domination
summary: Domination is a first-person horror, action and story game, where you get involved in conspiracies about the Reptilians

name: Dog Simulator 2015
summary: Play as a real puppy - jump, bark, destroy the house and do whatever you want. Now with a multiplayer mode you can do that with your friends and people all over the world. Cute puppies and fun adventures are waiting for you!

name: Donut Distraction
summary: Ever wanted to be an Elephant and catch, dodge and destroy donuts with your trunk??  NOW YOU CAN!!

name: Doctor Who Infinity
summary:
Brought to you by the teams behind the award-winning Doctor Who: Legacy game. This is an innovative new platform for telling original Doctor Who stories.

Written, drawn, and narrated by incredible talent mixed with a unique take on tile puzzle gameplay.

name: Doodle Truck 2
summary: Everyone’s favorite trucking series rolls back into the App Store! Day or night, rain or shine, real truckers are always ready to truck, so pick up your load and deliver the goods! Just remember to buckle up, because it’s gonna be one wild ride!

name: Domino
summary: Will you be the first to place all your tiles on the table for a win? Enjoy endless fun with this easy-to-play interface.

name: Doppelganger: Nightmare Realm
summary: This is a dark story about a little boy trying to survive in a parallel world of his doppelganger. You will have to experience adventures in places of life and death of your doppelganger, solve all the puzzles, and make your way from the cemetery to birth.

name: Dorachan
summary: Dorachan is an arcade game featuring the likeness of the robotic cat Doreamon, who is better known from manga and anime. The game involves avoiding enemies and collecting dots before a timer runs out, and consists of two screens of play.

name: Dogz
summary: In December 1999, a Game Boy Color port of Dogz (also known as Dogz - Your Virtual Petz Pals) as well as a companion port of Catz was released.

name: Dog Adventure Harmony
summary: A fictitious RPG where you search for your lost dog in a fantasy world. Fight make-believe monsters and dodge creative bullet hell attacks. Meet its imaginary characters... and their creator if you'd like.

name: Doors: The Game!
summary: Doors is a 2D platformer based on the animated series of the same name. For over 10 years Doors has been a collaborative effort featuring a record-breaking amount of artists coming together, each designing and animating their own room linked together to form one long adventure!

name: Doomsday Hunters: Boss Rush Mega Pack
summary: Doomsday Hunters: Boss Rush Mega Pack is the first expansion for our beloved super roguelike shooter, offering an even more extensive array of content. Try new relics and familiars, fight endless supply of bosses in the Boss Rush mode!

name: Doraemon Chinou Daikaihatsu! Waku-waku Game Land
Doraemon Waku-waku Sekai Isshuu Game: Asonde Oboeru Chizu Kokki
Dodge
summary: Dodge is a minimalist arcade-style game originally made for Ludum Dare 26. Your aim is simple: To dodge the incoming squares for as long as possible.

name: Down There Somewhere
summary: Can you survive ?A small submarine is sent to the depths of the ocean for research. But an unidentified creature attacks the submarine. You know that the rescue team will send a new submarine in about 10 hours. Can you survive 10 hours in the dark depths of the ocean?

name: Doki-doki Cooking Series 2: Gourmet Kitchen - Suteki na Obentou
Don't Go, Pikachu!
summary:
No time to rest! Pikachu has been kidnapped and needs your help!

Battle your way through five randomly generated environments in this unique roguelike adventure!
Beating the game rewards a badge and unlocks new starters — can you collect all?

Short roguelike Pokémon fangame that runs with a fast combat system featuring permadeath and limited PP.

name: Doomed Urbex
summary: Doomed Urbex is a community project first started last year by RastaManGames, with the concept of being a wad focused mainly on city maps

name: Do I Pass?
summary: "Do I Pass" is a visual novel where you play as a transgender woman who is worried about if she passes or not. With the help of a magical webpage she becomes a ghost and peeks into the minds of others to determine how they feel about her.

name: Doge to the Moon
summary: An action game that will test your reaction and teach you how to adjust to timings...

name: Downtown River City Baseball Story: Play Ball, Kunio!
summary:
Tatsumi Tachibana, An honor student and a superb athlete, is the team captain of Nekketsu High's Baseball team. An injury on his shoulder bars him from leading Nekketsu High to Japan's National High School Baseball Tournament. His girlfriend and team manager of Nekketsu High's Baseball team, Rika Asano, is heartbroken and unable to fulfill her duties as team manager. This motivates Sugata Sanjuro, who has a crush on her, to lead the Nekketsu team in the baseball tournament.

Todou Kounosuke holds a conference and announces that Japan's National High School Baseball Tournament will commence, and Nekketsu High will be lead by Sugata. Will Nekketsu be able to defeat Reihou Academy and the other teams with Kunio nowhere to be found?

name: Down to Earth
summary:
You are a magical witch from Earth who has crash landed on a distant planet. It seems to be inhabited by some unfriendly space cats. 
 
You must find the portals to the wormholes that will hopefully lead you back... Down to Earth... 
 
This is a game called "Down to Earth" (named after the theme of the game jam) created in 7 days, if you want to see it expanded and turned into a full game definitely leave a comment [on itch].

name: Doctor Who: Art Attack
summary: Art Attack was an online game based the Doctor Who episode Fear Her. The game is played as the Tenth Doctor. He is trapped in a drawing and must connect the dots on three different levels to find the Tardis.

name: Don't Go Alone
summary:
Don't Go Alone is a horror role-playing game.

The player can choose their party from a variety of 16 paranormal characters available. With their party they'll investigate a haunted house on a hill.

The house is huge and players will encounter over 100 spooky opponents and solve various puzzles in order to find out the mysteries of the haunted house. An automap feature helps prevent the player from loosing track in the huge dungeons of the game.

name: Doraemon: Nobita no Doki-doki! Obake Land
summary:
Doraemon: Nobita no Doki-doki! Obake Land is a cancelled 1996 action Virtual Boy game based on the popular manga/anime Doraemon by Fujiko Fujio. The game was developed by Epoch and planned to released in March 1996.
The game would have Doraemon go through each stage by riding roller-coasters or bungee-jumps. Doraemon would also have to search for hidden tools and rescue his friends who were captured by ghosts. The game would also have five characters as playable characters, each with a unique attack.

name: Doba Dash
summary: Doba Dash is a 3d combat racing game about recycling, climate change and the champions racing to beat global warming. This is our attempt at educating and entertaining the youth while inspiring a new generation of champions to rise up and play their part in saving our planet.

name: Dominion: Renaissance
summary: Renaissance is the 12th expansion to Dominion. It includes 25 new Kingdom cards. There are tokens that let you save coins and actions for later, Projects that grant abilities, and Artifacts to fight over.

name: Doug
summary: A handheld LCD game based on the Doug franchise.

name: Donkey Kong
summary: An unofficial port of Donkey Kong for the Uzebox.

name: Domino Marble
summary: I have a cute bead that likes candy. You make your way out of various blocks to collect the candy your marbles like and send them to the target. Find in many ways using physics. It may seem easy to collect all the candies, but can you get them all?

name: Doom 2 In City Only
summary: Doom 2 In City Only is a 36 map megawad in MBF21 format featuring nothing but city maps. Some of these maps are very large, so it is recommended you play with OpenGL. The set was primarily tested in dsda-doom. There are 6 secret maps (one per episode) with the secret exit being in the middle map of each episode. Jumping and freelook are not intended for this set and will break some maps.

name: Doctor Who: Black Hole
summary: The TARDIS must escape the black hole by bouncing on asteroids and comets that are in its path and avoiding space debris.

name: Doodle Jump - Insanely Good!
summary:
Play this FREE version of the mega-hit game Doodle Jump and find out for yourself what millions of players around the world already know: 
 
DOODLE JUMP IS INSANELY ADDICTIVE! 
 
In Doodle Jump, you guide Doodle the Doodler—using some of the most subtle and accurate tilt controls in existence—on a springy journey up, up, up a sheet of graph paper, picking up jet packs, avoiding black holes, and blasting baddies with nose balls along the way. 
 
Laugh with delight as Doodle blows past other players' actual score markers scribbled in the margins. And be warned: this game is insanely addictive.

name: Don't Get Tagged
summary: Escape the Bobber occupied levels by doing puzzles and strategic movement through levels. Experience a variety of levels and challenges through out your play through, overcoming obstacles and those that block your path completely. Just don't get tagged In the processes.

name: Do No Harm
summary: 17+ Life and death are always on the line for a surgeon. But a dangerous, alluring stranger pulls you into an even deadlier world.

name: Dormant World
summary: A retro NES/Famicom-inspired platformer, Dormant World leaves the fate of the world in the player's hands. Can you single-handedly defeat the gods of sleep and save the world from endless slumber?

name: Donut or Cookie
summary: Donut or Cookie is a side-view physics puzzle game. The player needs to toss a pink donut or cookie into the customer's bag. you can choose a donut or a cookie, they have 2 shapes, a circle and a square, this is actively used in solving puzzles.

name: Down the Ratbit Hole
summary: Medium sized medieval library map using Knave textures - made for the SM100 turtlemap event.

name: Do I Have a Right?
summary: Run your own firm of lawyers who specialize in constitutional law.

name: Dots and Dashes
summary: A rendition of the pen and paper classic game of Dots and Dashes. Player settable board size, with ability to to play against other players, or the program or both. Seven computer playing levels will allow players of all skill levels to enjoy the game. Leader boards are available to record wins.

name: Domo Jump
summary: From Kung Fu Factory.

name: Doubutsu-jima no Chobigurumi 2: Tama-chan Monogatari
summary: The main characters try to use the sweet smell of sweets as a signal to tell Tama-chan's mother where the lost Tama-chan is. Collect recipes and ingredients to make sweets in over 50 mini-games.

name: Doom II: Community Chest 3
summary: Community Chest 3 (cchest3.wad) is a 2007 megawad that contains 32 new levels, made by members of the Doomworld community. It requires a Boom-compatible source port to play. It is the second sequel to Community Chest, preceded by Community Chest 2 and followed by Community Chest 4. It was one of the winners of Doomworld's Cacowards for 2007.

name: Dog Guardian and the Fallen Star
summary: The locals need your help!

name: Dodge If you Can!
summary: Dodge If you Can! A simple game where you will either emerge as a Master of strategy, or become a statistic. Will your strategy and wits prevail among the storm of bullets? Will you go down as a legend? Only you can decide. Now - Dodge, If you Can!

name: Doom City
summary: A large city block

name: Doom II: Community Chest 4
summary: Community Chest 4 (cchest4.wad) is a 2012 megawad that contains 32 new levels, made by members of the Doomworld community. It requires a Boom-compatible source port with increased SEGS limits to play. It is the third sequel to Community Chest, preceded by Community Chest 3. It was released on August 17, 2012. It received both a normal award and the Mordeth Award during the 2012 Cacowards.

name: Don't Sink
summary: Capture islands, sink ships, defend your towns, and discover an exciting world full of adventure.

name: DOP 4: Draw One Part
summary: If you’re an art lover, you’ll definitely want to try out this great drawing brain teaser! Put your logic and lateral thinking powers to the test as you try and figure out what is off about each of the adorable drawings in front of you. This puzzle is relaxing yet also stimulating, offering a perfect balance that keeps your mind engaged - you’ll find yourself coming back for more and more as you enjoy the challenge and the charm of the artwork. Whether you're unwinding after a long day or just looking for a fun way to sharpen your mind, this drawing brain teaser is the perfect activity.

name: Dono's Tale
summary: Relive the glory days of the 16 and 32-bit era in Dono's Tale. A super cute and colorful platformer about a hungry little dragon! Jump, dash, climb, and shoot your way through detailed and colorful worlds in order to get back your precious fruit!

name: Dollhouse Builder Craft: Doll House Building Games
Don't Starve Mega Pack 2020
summary:
Includes Four Items:
• Don't Starve: Giant Edition
• Don't Starve: Hamlet Console Edition (DLC)
• Don't Starve: Shipwrecked Console Edition (DLC)
• Don't Starve Together: Console Edition
• PLUS “Large Bolt Chest” that contains 12,000 Bolts of Cloth in Don't Starve Together!

name: Dougie Moo's Aqua Antics
summary: Dougie Moo's Aqua Antics

name: Doodle Saver
summary: Hooray! Vacation! The whole office is having rest on the sea! Swim, swim and swim again! The true thing is, someone is not so good at swimming but fearless rescuer is on the guard all the time! It's you! Look after the swimmers, beware. Help those who swims bad! The love of savee and a lot of bonuses will be given to you as a reward. Be the best!

name: Don't run out of Soda
summary: You'll find yourself in abadoned parking lot, where's mad scientist puts you in difficult situation. You have to escape from his creation. You have five tries.

name: Dodgeout+
summary: A videogame inspired by breakout, but now you dodge the projectiles that you shoot.

name: Down Means Up
summary: What makes Down Means Up unique, is that you can flip the direction of gravity. You can even flip gravity in mid-air. This makes for some interesting gameplay, where inertia plays a key role in landing the jump.

name: Doom 404
summary:
DOOM 404 is a 32-level, vanilla-compatible (complevel 2) megawad. Every map was built with 404 lines or fewer, as a nod to the project name, to keep the map design focused on the key concept for each level.

It's a sad life on the Space Marine IT Help Desk. Especially when you're stuck on the graveyard shift. Night after night of "Did you try rebooting?" Not exactly what you expected when you signed up.
You figured this call would be more of the same: some garbled voice mail about "gremlins in the system". Gremlins? Seriously, how old is the guy who left that? Ninety five? He probably remembers vacuum tubes.
Now you're here though, something isn't right. This facility should be busy, but it's silent. Almost desolate. You're starting to feel glad you brought that popgun they issued you with to make you look like a real soldier ...

name: Dodonpachi True Death exA Label
summary: Dodonpachi True Death exA Label is an expanded arcade-exclusive rerelease of Dodonpachi Saidaioujou. It features the original arcade and arrange modes from the Xbox 360 version, with their HD graphics display, alongside a brand-new "exA Label" mode. This new mode features rebalanced gameplay and heightened risk/reward via a reworked hyper shot system.

name: DoomsDay
summary: DoomsDay is a faction-based, PvPvE survival game set in Kentucky. Players will choose a Faction and work with, or compete against, other players to contribute to that Faction's collection of resources.

name: Donut Dodo Do!
summary:
Donut Dodo Do! is an exclusive for exA-Arcadia Cabinets.
Up to 2 players can climb, jump and run to collect all of the stolen donuts through 6 unique stages. Even casual players can play with this game by moving the joystick and pressing the single button to jump.

Choose to play up to 3 loops in the Arcade mode or go for the high score in Score Attack mode.

name: Dojini
summary: Dojini is a 2d platformer game where you control two characters at the same time. After the Dojini had his body and mind split into two different dinos after a wizard put a curse on him for eating his apples

name: Don't Save the Princess
summary: An anti-runner in which you control the obstacles instead of the runner. Strike, combo, and upgrade to finally earn the princess some personal time!

name: Doom 4 For Doom
summary:
D4D brings Doom 2016's weapons to GZDoom for all to enjoy, including a few customized versions of the multiplayer weapons. To this day, the mod is continuously being made more and more Doom '16-like, slowly but surely.

Guns. Demons. Violence. Runes. Glory. And it continues to grow to this day.

name: Donkey Konga
summary: The North American port of Donkey Konga, which has a track listing different from the original Japanese version.

name: Dominion: Intrigue
summary: Intrigue is the 1st expansion to Dominion. It includes 26 new Kingdom cards. There are victory cards that do things for you, underlings that give you a choice as to what they do, and a variety of other cards. It adds up to six players support.

name: Donutis Simulator
summary: You can prepare delicious and richly decorated donuts in your donut shop by purchasing the ingredients written in the recipe. During the game, you buy new furniture in your store and provide the best comfort to your customers. Don't forget to pay the bills! Jump in your car and enjoy the fun.

name: Doom Absolution
summary: Doom Absolution is a cancelled sequel to Doom 64, announced as a project for the Nintendo 64 game console by Midway Games in cooperation with id Software shortly after the release of the first game. It was intended to be multiplayer-oriented, possibly excluding any single player elements altogether.

name: Down Beneath
summary: a short 3D horror game

name: Dog Fight Super Ultra Deluxe
summary: Take to the skies in this fast paced, aerial combat game featuring blazing gameplay. Keep your home safe solo against a swarm of UFOs or compete against other players in online multiplayer modes.

name: Don't Starve: Nintendo Switch Edition
summary: In Don’t Starve: Nintendo Switch Edition, you play as Wilson, an intrepid Gentleman Scientist who has been trapped by a demon and transported to a mysterious wilderness world. Enter a bizarre and unexplored world full of strange creatures, dangers, and surprises. Learn to exploit the environment and its inhabitants to escape and find your way back home.

name: Dorm Days
summary: Dorm Days is a casual, RPG, dating sim. This indie game takes you into the life of a college student.

name: Downgeon Quest
summary: Downgeon Quest now brings you the unique rogue-like experience! Dumholf needs your help to battle and craft his way through the depths of a dungeon, collecting recipes and artifacts to increase the power, and find new heroes to delve ever deeper underground!

name: Do-M Imouto O-nedari Kojin Lesson: Watashi no Sex Katei-kyoushi Oniichan
Doctor Who: Flight Simulator
summary: A flight simulator game inspired by the Doctor Who Series 2 episode "The Impossible Planet".

summary: A fighting game where every injury is transferred to the other player

name: Doki Doki Literature Club: Purist Mod
summary: A fanmade mod that turns Doki Doki Literature Club into a traditional VN/dating-sim

name: Donkey Kong
summary:
Donkey Kong is an unreleased port for the TRS-80 based on the Nintendo arcade game of the same name from 1981. The hero of the Nintendo game is a carpenter named Mario. The goal is to rescue Mario’s girlfriend Pauline from the marauding Donkey Kong. Mario needs to reach Pauline at the top of the screen, all the while dodging barrels thrown by Donkey Kong. Other obstacles include conveyor belts, elevators, and fireballs.

It was being developed by game designers Wayne Westmoreland and Terry Gilman. The port was eventually finished, but never received an official release as the duo could not get permission from Nintendo.

Later, in 1995, Westmoreland released all of their TRS-80 titles to the public domain, including the unreleased port of Donkey Kong.

name: Doodle Jump HD
summary:
BE WARNED: Insanely addictive! 
"possibly the best iPhone game ever created" - Touch Arcade 

From prime-time sitcoms (BIG BANG THEORY) to late night TV (JIMMY FALLON) to a fashion accessory for pop stars (LADY GAGA), Doodle Jump is EVERYWHERE! It's a cultural craze, a hot new trend! 

The iPad version brings you all that you love in the original iPhone game with brilliantly rendered full screen iPad graphics, lush environments, and AWESOME iPad-only features including a special multiplayer racetrack theme!

*********************************************

In Doodle Jump, you guide Doodle the Doodler—using some of the most subtle and accurate tilt controls in existence—on a springy journey up, up, up a sheet of graph paper, picking up jet packs, avoiding black holes, and blasting baddies with nose balls along the way. 

Laugh with delight as Doodle™ blows past other players' actual score markers scribbled in the margins. And be warned: this game is insanely addictive. 


FEATURES: 
- 12 incredible worlds + SECRET easter eggs 
- broken, moving, disappearing, moveable, shifting, and EXPLODING platforms 
- JET PACKs, PROPELLER HATS, ROCKETS, and springs that fly you higher 
- UFOs, black holes, monsters, bear traps! 
- jump on monsters to bring them down MARIO-style 
- share your scores r 
- race agains friends! 
- global leaderboards, achievements! 

How to play: 
Tilt to move left or right, tap the screen to shoot. 
______________________________________________________________________
* BE WARNED: This game is INSANELY addictive!
* Don't doodle jump and drive!

name: Dominator Idle
summary: Dominator Idle is the ultimate idle game for world domination. Train troops and purchase magical upgrades in order to takeover the entirety of earth. With a powerful prestige system you can grow your power to unfathomable standards allowing to your conquer stronger versions of Earth.

name: Donut Drop With Molly & Friends
summary: Oh no! Donuts are dropping out of nowhere and Molly and her friends need your help. Use your finger to drag Molly, Maximus, Rhonda, or Walter across the screen and collect ONLY the donuts shown at the top. You do not want to catch the wrong donut or it will be game over!

name: Downloaded: Fragments of a Forgotten Soul
summary:
In this rage worthy game help Keeli, a goddess of technology, find her redemption after falling from grace.

Face 8 challenging levels, 3 bosses, and confront your own corruption.

Includes Steam Achievements as well as in game side challenges and an amazing soundtrack.

Formatted for Keyboard or Controller use.

name: Doc the Destroyer
summary: In this unique hybrid action RPG from 1987, take on the role of Doc the Destroyer, outcast and heretic in a post-apocalyptic wasteland, as he battles to save the dwellers of a life-saving dome from extinction. Make decisions in a branching storyline, and fight in one-on-one battle sequences.

name: Donkey Kong 5: The Journey of Over Time and Space
summary: Donkey Kong 5: The Journey of Over Time and Space is a bootleg game for the Game Boy Color. It is a clone of Super Mario Bros. Deluxe, also released for the Game Boy Color (but it is not a hack).

name: Doppelganger
summary: The doppelganger is a puzzle platformer game. Player will play as a young boy finding his lost cat, in the meantime he also obtains power which can alter dimension. Player need to use their wisdom to overcome the obstacle.

name: Dollar
summary:
In Dollar the player takes the role of a female police officer who has to solve a tough case: The murder of Elisabeth Lindberg who has been found in the men's room of a hotel in Stockholm. After her father's death she took over the business, much to the disapproval of some employees and relatives. She's also a former model and has been recently divorced from a famous pop star. This means there are a lot of suspects around...

The player takes the role of the supervisor and never leaves his office - exceptions are the interrogations which he is also responsible for; his two assistants are specialised in forensics and general investigations. The player gives his orders by stamping fields on the various info sheets, e.g. to to execute a search warrant he opens the house sheet and drags & drops the stamp on the corresponding field. After a short while he receives the results in an e-mail - every time new information arrive these can be directly accessed by clicking on a symbol in the upper left corner.

The player also has four other tools to his disposal which help him solving the case. The phone is used to call three people: The managing inspector who gives hints when stuck, the district attorney to receive search warrants and a journalist who can give important additional information. A special board is dedicated to show the relationships of all suspects to the victim or to each other. Here the player also orders the surveillance of a suspect. The computer has a timeline of the crime saved which is used to find discrepancies in the statements of the suspects and unaccounted time. Finally the map shows all locations which are relevant to the investigation.

Before the interrogations the player has to choose up to three topics. He often has the choice between a nice and a confrontational statement. While the latter may bring more information it can also offend the suspect and lead him to stop the conversation. It is, however, not possible to get stuck because of that.

name: Doctor Who: Attack of the Graske
summary:
A Graske is loose and causing havoc. Can you help to stop him? Become the Doctor's companion and save the world!

An interactive adventure originally available via the BBC Red Button feature, then released as a Flash game online.

name: Doki Doki Literature Club
summary: An unofficial port for the PSP.

name: Dofus: Battles 2
summary:
Say goodbye to Tower Defence gameplay and get ready for Tower Attack!
This time around, you'll play as Jeff Stobbs, your old enemy, who finally managed to free himself from Naz T Peasawerk's demonic hold.
Tame the World of Twelve's monsters to form an army and use Jeff's new invention, the Slablet, to send them into battle and defeat your foes.
Your enemies are in position, and so are their traps. They're ready for battle… Are you? Prepare your strategy, line up your waves of monsters and march forth!

name: Domino VR
summary: Domino VR is a new and simple VR game for the HTC Vive designed to let you experience that "nooooo, they're falling!" feeling all over again. You can build whatever you want in a fun sandbox environment.

name: Donkey Kong Junior
summary: This is the Intellivision port of the homonymous arcade game

name: Doki Doki SummerTime
summary: Finally, school is over! You are put in the place of a handsome but reclusive young man. It's been over half a year since you spoke to your childhood friend Sayori. One day, she unexpectedly invites him to join her and school class speaker Monika at a pool, this unique event turned out to be the start of something new and exciting for one of the four girls.

name: Doghouse
summary: You are constructing the perfect doghouse for your beloved pet. But while you're working away, you notice that your dog looks... different.

name: Dome RPG
summary: "Dome RPG is a game about a boy who once woke up in a strange world. Explore a mysterious world with unique visuals, interesting characters and lots of mysteries to uncover!" (From Steam description)

name: Doku's Noodle Empire
summary: You arrive in a distant fishing village to find an ancient sushi recipe. Cook food, discover recipes, meet friends, and more in this isometric, pixel art adventure game!

name: Dope TrashCanners
summary: An online shooter with a twist: Each death give your more power.

name: DopeNet
summary: DopeNet is a fantasy dark web drug dealing simulator. Buy low, sell high, stay free.

name: Don't Crash: The Zombie Game
summary: WARNING THIS GAME CRASHES WHEN YOU DIE! IT'S THE POINT OF THE GAME! Game features "endless" Zombie and Soldier combat, several levels As well as a shotgun, pistols, assault rifles, RPG Launcher and a knife. This is a work in progress game.

name: Downtown Drift
summary: Where you can experience a fun drifting game unblocked called Downtown Drift, which provides an adrenaline-pumping racing game. Join a game of car racing through the city, in which you must drive your car at a high rate of speed along an express highway. Downtown Drift is a game of car racing through the city. You'll be going three vehicles and attempting to win every race. If you want to complete a track, you must win each challenge in a row. You must finish each race in first place to advance to the next race and earn points for your efforts.

name: Do You Want More!?
summary: Play as Lloyd Arch, the young private detective known for being total dick, and unravel the mystery of the Black Scar Serial Killer in this visual novel adventure, but remember that the truth tends to hurt the most.

name: Dole: 5 A Day Adventures
summary: Dole: 5 A Day Adventures is an edutainment PC game.

name: Dokodemo Pop'n Music
summary: A rhythm game released with Pop’n Music 2.
platforms: Visual Memory Unit / Visual Memory System

name: Donkey Kong Junior
summary: This is the ColecoVision port of the homonymous arcade game

name: Doodle God Blitz: The Return of the King
summary: This DLC Contains The Return of the King Quest. Your Goal is to help the Prince restore his kingdom’s faded glory. His father was a good king and his kingdom was great and prosperous. When Prince grew up, he set out on a campaign and when he returned, he found his father dead and the kingdom in decline.

name: Dodgeball rising
summary:
Dodgeball Rising is all about making use of a variety of unique and distinct dodgeball moves to take on a series of ever-changing battles with your own play style. This competitive dodgeball action game features a Japan-influenced setting with samurai, ninja, and more.

Development discontinued on November 20th, 2018.

name: Doka 2: Guts Out Ninja

summary: Allies is the 14th expansion to Dominion. It has 400 cards, with 31 new Kingdom card piles. There are Allies that will do Favors for you, and split piles you can rotate.

name: Donkey Kong Junior
summary: This is the BBC Micro port of the homonymous arcade game. It was finished, but never released.

name: Donut Maker
summary:
Tie on your apron and come fry up some warm, delicious donuts! Roll up your sleeves and join in on the greasy and messy fun! The original developers of the 'MAKER' series bring you Donut Maker!
First, mix the donut dough ingredients. After the dough is thoroughly mixed, roll it out using the rolling pin. Then, use the donut cutter to cut out each individual donut. Now, place each donut in the fryer until it is golden brown. Be careful not to forget about them or they will disappear in the grease!
Once the donuts are done to perfection, you get to decorate them! There are several categories to choose from so your donuts have just the right amount of icing and sprinkles! The decorating categories are:
- Plates: Choose from a variety of fun plates to place your yummy donut on!
- Icing: Select your base icing from an array of cute colors!
- Paint on Icing: Find a contrasting icing color to paint on your own creative design!
- Icing decorations: Select fun icing swirls and designs to add to your donuts!
- Icing accents: Add some stars, dots, and loop-de-loops!
- Candies and nuts: Sprinkle on fun colored candies! There are even cute holiday ones!
Finally, it’s time to eat your donut… or two… or three!
Post it on Facebook or email it to a friend!
Or, save it in the fridge to show off or eat later!
For more fun, be sure to try your hand at Chop Shop and test your chopping skills or take the food challenge and see how many cupcakes you can eat in 30 seconds!
Donut Maker is brought to you by the inventors of the MAKER series of games. If you enjoy our games, tell your friends, and write a review! Enjoy!

name: Donut Break: Head to Head
summary: Donut Break Head to Head is a retro arcade game that lets 1 and 2 players play head to head in a competitive arcade environment. Unique animated pastries tumble down toward the users paddle along with Mini-Bosses and Powerups. Collect donut powerups as you progress through the levels and defeat your opponent.

name: Dominium Mundi
summary: Dominium Mundi is a lightweight 4X strategy game set in the medieval period where 4 players compete to create the most influential empire. Expand your empire over the map, convert more people to your religion, and control more trade routes.

name: Dots of War
summary: Dots of War is an addictive and competitive puzzle game (based on dots and boxes or Timbiriche) in which you have to connect points with lines to gain ground against your opponent.

name: Doom: The Golden Souls 2
summary:
Doom: The Golden Souls 2 is the sequel of the groundbreaking mario styled hub-based mod, this time you'll travel through levels with a world map, unlocking new paths by reaching secret exits or by collecting big coins. You must retrieve 7 Golden Souls stolen by the Cyberdemon's minions in order to save the world... once again!

Featuring improved platforming mechanics, weapons, levels, Golden Souls 2 is an experience any Doom fan should try!

name: Doombox
summary:
DoomBox is the hidden area in a desert. This is a land for a nuclear waste,
which is a perfect plase for those alien bastards to start their invasion!

name: Downtown Journey

name: Doki Doki Chefs
summary: Can you make enough soup before time runs out?! A Gameboy-style demake of Overcooked for Demake JAM!

name: Douglas Rockmoor 2

name: Don't Hate My Music Taste
summary: Don't Hate My Music Taste is a first person shooter with a dynamic map that changes according to the playing music. You play your music so that no one can hate your music taste.

name: Double 345 Slots
summary:
Welcome to Double 345 Slots- the Vegas-style 2x 3x 4x 5x pay slot machine!
Double 345 Slots is a mobile version of the classical 3-reel, 9-payline slot machine - perfect for the novices and the experts of Vegas-style slot machines!
Begin with 700 credits and use the on-screen controls to place your bet. Then, just press ‘Spin’ to spin the reels! Play all the 9 paylines and get bigger win!! See what you can win and climb the leaderboard with your total wins. Double 345 Slots is fun, addictive and free-to-play!
Are you feeling lucky today? Play now and win big - Double 345 Slots - the addictive slot machine game for mobile!

name: Dorian Morris Adventure
summary: Will the secrets of your missing grandfather be finally discovered? Who is your friend, and who should you avoid? What is the mysterious Book of Knowledge? Do you really know who you are and what is your destination?

name: Doki Doki Blue Skies
summary: Doki Doki Blue Skies is a Visual Novel game, developed by Blue Dissonance Development, which was released in 2020.

name: Donut Mod
summary: Donut Mod is a re-imagining of the original Simpsons: Hit & Run story.

name: Dot Artist
summary: A pixel art game from Rainy Frog

name: Doki Doki Vacation: Kirameku Kisetsu no Naka de
summary: Dokidoki Vacation tells the story of a Japanese teenager called Junichi. High school is over, the summer vacation has begun. But due to the young man's uneasy relationship with his family and other circumstances, he cannot afford the vacation he was hoping for. So Junichi decides to find a job. He starts working in a book store, and soon realizes that feelings develop between him and Megumi, a girl who works in the same place. But what about the classmate Junichi was in love with before?..

name: Don't Fall
summary: Destroy the blocks, get points, don't let the hexagon fall from the tower

name: Doom Ultimate Enhanced
summary: Doom Ultimate Enhanced is an enhanced mod that tries to improve the game without destroying the gameplay and balancing it. I try to give a better experience to the player. Basing in mods like Brutal Doom, Beautiful Doom, Doom Enhanced and Enhanced Vanilla Project. Some features that the mod offers are: - Some smooth animations for the weapons, items and decorations. - New sounds for the weapons. - Some Wolfenstein 3D enemies added. Among other things that there is or will be in this mod.

name: Don't Pray to Satan
summary: Don't Pray To Satan is an unforgiving city simulator/strategy game, where you must monitor and protect your city's inhabitants from praying to Satan and bringing about the end of days.

name: Doom Work
summary: In this atypical game, your role is to prevent the working robots from finishing construction to save the forest!

name: Doraemon Story of Seasons: Friends of the Great Kingdom - Together with Animals

name: Double S.T.E.A.L.: The Second Clash

Missions can have varied objectives such as destroying a number of Yakuza targets or getting to a point in the city while being hounded by Yakuza cars. Missions have far more generous time limits compared to the first game, but they are also now rated, and earning a high rating on a mission with a quick time can unlock Extra Missions and cars. Most cars can earn multiple turbo boosts by destroying property and traffic, and if the boost bar is maxed out then it will be expelled all at once and stop time as well.

The free mode of the PlayStation 2 and GameCube versions of Wreckless makes a return, allowing Madoka and Mei to drive around the city without worrying about objectives or time limits. Boxes of car parts can be found hidden around Chicago, and for every five boxes found a new car will be unlocked. Extra Missions can be found as well that have non-Yakuza related objectives, such as winning a dirt race, reaching checkpoints, or delivering pizza in time.

name: Doom 64 EX
summary:
Doom 64 EX is a reimplementation of Doom 64 by Samuel "Kaiser" Villarreal. It is based on Doom3D, though rewritten for OpenGL rather than DirectX, and including some bug fixes from Boom and MBF. It aims to recreate the look and feel of Doom 64 as closely as possible, based on specifications obtained through reverse engineering, similarly to how Kaiser also created SvStrife.

The first public version of Doom64 EX was released on July 10, 2008.

Compared to the Doom 64: Absolution TC, the principal difference is that Doom64 EX uses the original data. A tool provided with the port can create a DOOM64.WAD IWAD from the ROM.

Doom 64 plays almost identically to earlier games in the Doom series; the player must advance through numerous levels fighting demons, collecting weapons and keys and hitting switches in order to reach the level's exit while surviving deadly traps and ambushes. Changes were made to the Doom engine for use in Doom 64, and gameplay elements were altered.

Weapons
All the weapons from the original game are present, but redrawn with new sprites. The chainsaw was given two blades instead of one, the fists have bloodstained gloves on instead of brass knuckles, the plasma rifle has an electric core that emits a sparking sound when equipped, the rocket launcher has a small kick when fired, pushing the player back a bit, the shotgun's reloading cock is at the handle instead of under the barrel and the Super Shotgun reloads faster and causes recoil.

A new weapon known as the Laser, or "Unmaker", was added, using the same cell ammunition as the plasma rifle and BFG. It was first mentioned in the Doom Bible and was planned to be featured in the PC Doom games but never appeared. Its appearance in Doom 64 is its only official appearance. With the power of three ancient artifacts found in the game, it becomes more powerful by shooting three laser beams (at a quicker rate than default) instead of one. The first artifact increases the laser speed, the second artifact adds a second laser and the third artifact allows the weapon to fire three simultaneous lasers which can automatically aim separately from one another, allowing the weapon to attack three different enemies at once.

Plot
Following the conclusion of the original Doom series, the sole Marine who survived the horrors of hell had returned to Earth, reclaiming it from the invasion that almost eradicated the human race. Demons still lingered within the abandoned halls and complexes of Phobos and Deimos. As a last-ditch effort, the military decided to bombard the moons with extreme radiation in hopes of killing off any remaining demons. Initially it was successful, however something survived the exposure. The radiation blocked the military's sensors and allowed something to slip past them undetected. This mysterious entity, possessing the ability to resurrect any demon it came across, recreated the entire demonic horde and made it stronger than ever before. A Marine strike force was ordered to contain the advancing armies of hell but was mercilessly slaughtered within moments. The player's character is the sole survivor of this group.

The games were re-compiled into hacked ROMs titled "Super DK!" and "Super DK Junior" respectively; the unaltered ROMs were never released.

summary: "Dinner's ready!", Grandma's worst nightmare came true as your sister is still playing in the cellar. Make your way through varying and challenging puzzles before the dinner is getting cold.

name: Doom: Slayer's Testament
summary: Recreating the newschool Doom experience in the old quake engine. Basicly a moddable demake with strafejumping.

name: Doom 2D
summary: Doom 2D is a fan-made DOS-based freeware side-scrolling video game based upon Doom. Doom 2D is essentially the original Doom translated into a two-dimensional arcade or console-like shooter. The player resumes their role as Doomguy, who must do battle with various hell-spawn.

name: Dodge & Weave
summary: Dodge & Weave is a top down, bullet hell, survival game where your goal is to survive each level for 60 seconds

name: DodgeBall Blitz
summary:
Lead your team to victory in this fast-paced, action, sports game! Use Power ups, and avoid attacks, as you fight to claim your glory! 
 It's up to you to choose the team that suits you and your talents. Then hone your skills and master the techniques worthy to be called the best in the league!

name: Don't Get Crucified
summary: In Don't Get Crucified, players guide the Lamb of God away from crucifixes and other obstacles.

name: Doomsday Castle
summary: You have to shoot your way through the eponymous castle.

name: Dobrynya Nikitich i Zmey Gorynych
summary: Based on the animated film of the same name Dobrynya Nikitich i Zmey Gorynych is the second game in Bogatyrs series. The game is a classic point-and-click adventure with a few brief acrcade-style episodes that looks and plays very similar to Alyosha Popovich i Tugarin Zmej. Prince Vladimir's niece Zabava was kidnapped and the trail leads to Zmey Gorynych, the three-headed dragon. Dobrynya Nikitich and his apprentice Yelisey come to the rescue to discover a plot of treachery along the way. The player controls either of two heroes that are switched automatically depending on the situation.

name: Dodge Club Pocket
summary: The underground ravers of Dodge Club invite YOU to play in their pixel dance party. Dodge the red hot fireball and electric spark in a variety of unique minigame challenges, each one more wild than the last! As you play, you'll even unlock mysterious bonus content in the form of "presents", including new characters, comics by Linzb0t, extra music, and more. Speck and her raver friends can't wait to meet you, so join the club now on your Nintendo 3DS with Dodge Club Pocket!

name: Dolphin Stunt Rider
summary:
Ride on the back of your favourite Dolphin!!

You must use all of your Stunt and dodging skills to reach the end of the Race . You’ll need quick reactions and nifty fingers, as there are many opposition players trying to take you down.Think you can dodge your way to the End Zone? Good,get ready, and let’s get running!

name: Dodgy Doodle
summary:
Dodgy Doodle is a unique doodling experience.
Doodle your way through a series of increasingly challenging levels, dodging obstacles and collecting dots. A simple and elegant experience that can be enjoyed by all ages.

name: Doom & Destiny Worlds: Unbreakable
summary: The Unbreakable DLC features a new set of Weapons and Armors, and allows you to start a game with the Unbreakable modifier. This will turn off equipment wear and apply some balancing to compensate.

name: Doka 2: Kishki Edition
summary: Doka 2: Kishki Edition is a game where you kill zombies, or you yourself are zombies, this is a game where you kill in the most sophisticated ways of people, that is, there you can come up with a certain area. Thank you for my rock childhood.

name: DomiCard
summary: Play Domino game in DomiCard. You can create as many dominos as you want in this game before your computer gets burned. Also, "Cubes" can be used to build anything you like, such as a bridge, a gate, or some other buildings.

name: Donuts Runner
summary: Donuts Runner is a 3D runner with a third-person view in which you have to control a cute fat cop. Run as far as possible while collecting as many donuts as possible. Beat your own records on the path to excellence and prove to everyone that you are the most fun cop in the area

name: Don't Explode
summary: 2 Player only arcade game with one rule, don't explode.

name: Doodleman
summary: Doodleman is an XNA community game

name: Dota DS
summary: Dota DS is an unofficial homebrew demake of the Warcraft III custom map "Defense of the Ancients" for DS.

name: Double Vision
summary: An XNA indie game that was developed by students from the University of Wales, Newport. Double Vision was part of the Global Game Jam.

name: Dog Collab
summary:
After 1.5 years, the Dog Collab is here! Earn over 70 stars across courses crafted by iconic SM64 modders, with the help of a furry friend! Fight tough bosses, play unique minigames, and put your platforming skills to the test in this hack. Optimized for real N64 hardware!

Levels created by Ashley, MrComit, someone2639, Cheezepin, BeverlyBean, Rovert, CowQuack, KeyBlader, an_unidentified_emu, Yoshi Milkman, Fazana, and thecozies.

name: Dot Brain
summary: Dot brain is a braintastic game for every puzzle games fan! Help the lovable brains regain their happiness and fortune!

name: Doki: Maternal
summary: Doki: Maternal is a Brazilian educational game for PC

name: Domain Defense
summary: Domain Defense focuses on what makes Tower Defense Great! Unique towers, distinct enemies, and up to four players in versus or cooperative modes.

name: Dodecadone
summary: A physics & logic puzzler about merging shapes and traits, similar to Suika games. A triangle might be bouncy, your septagon sick & coughing, or an ennenagon defying the laws of physics.

name: Dommy
summary: A maze game where you push blocks into place in a chain reaction.

name: Doodle God Blitz: Greatest Inventions
summary: Reinvent all of the wonderful things from the 20th century.

name: Don't Starve Together: Starter Pack 2024
summary: This Chest contains the playable character, Wurt: The Half-Pint, Wilson's Verdant skin set, Willow's Swashbuckler skin set, Wolfgang's Gladiator skin set, WX-78's Moonbound skin set, the Pastoral Chest, the Narwalrus Chester, and the Yawny Jammies Ensemble.

name: Donguri Koen: Jinkou Eisei Head Scissors Whip
summary: As an elementary school student, you meet a mysterious woman at the park after school. "It's just a little mini-game," she says. Enjoy playing familiar mini-games with this slightly competitive Onee-san! But why is she always at the park...?

name: Doko Demo Issho: Toro's Story App
summary: Doko Demo Issho: Toro's Story App was a mobile game made by Bexide and Sony Computer Entertainment Inc., which was released on May 18, 2006.

name: Do You Remember My Lullaby ?
summary: is a non-interactive short, simple story following one woman’s day during the Christmas season. It is slice-of-life in genre, delivered in a mellow tone and a pseudo music video format with barely any dialogue.

name: Don't Drop the White Ball 2
summary: Don't Drop The White Ball 2 - is a game for all ages. Enjoy this new arcade game wherein you have to simply save the falling balls from dropping. Navigate the stick from left to right and stop the balls from dropping while moving up the levels.

name: Dorifto Challenge
summary: Drift and high speed racing through mountain passes, highway mountain passes and pure highway sections based on real word laser scan data from mobile and aerial laser scan systems.

name: Dora & Team Umizoomi's Fantastic Flight
summary: Dora & Team Umizoomi's Fantastic Flight is a Nintendo DS game crossover between Dora The Explorer and Team Umizoomi.

name: Dorapan
summary: Dorapan is a 2D space shooter being developed for the Xbox Live Indie Game Marketplace. It is being created by students at Muhlenberg College.

name: Doodle God Blitz: Survivor
summary: Escape from the island in the middle of the ocean.

name: Doodle God Blitz: Let there be light
summary: Invade Hell & restore the light! To get the Angel into the party, you'll have to dress him up so that no one can recognize him! Make items for the Halloween costume!

name: Doodle God Blitz: Go Santa Go!
summary: This DLC contains "Go Santa Go!" Quest. Help Santa deliver his presents! Objectives: Make presents for everyone! Note: Some may want more than one present.

name: Doodle God Blitz: The Rise of Egypt
summary: Create a great civilization amid the lifeless desert

name: DOOM Abort
summary:
A sort of spiritual sequel to ouch_m, featuring dumb weapon ideas such as
defeating enemies through the power of headpats, or a button that crashes the
game when pressed.

name: Dorico no Toshokan
summary: An upcoming otome game by Rejet.

name: Don't Step White Tile: It's Me!
summary:
Don't Step White Tile - It's Me is the most popular leisure and entertainment game,which can test your speed and accuracy!
Playing is simple, but the process is very exciting. Come and experience it!
step, step, step ......

name: Don't Spill
summary: With a simple and colorful design, Don't Spill has many levels, where you must take care of the ingredients and potions, so your clients won't miss it. Do you have enough organization and ability to win?

name: Dorky Fork
summary: Dorky Fork is a simple yet сhallenging puzzle game about pushing cubes.

name: Dominion: Empires
summary: Empires, the 10th addition to the game of Dominion, adds 24 Kingdom cards, cards you can buy now and pay for later, piles with two different cards, and Landmarks that add new ways to score. VP tokens and Events return from previous sets.

name: Doguu Senki: Haou
summary: Turn-based strategy game for the Sega Dreamcast.

name: Dogchild
summary: A game about the youth Tarpak and his dog Taro.

name: DooM: Infernal Attack
summary: With more than a year of development, Infernal Attack is a mod for DooM that adds more that a half thousand of new enemies, more than a hundred new weapons, many objects, graphic effects and new player abilities that combine the best mods for DooM.

name: Doomsday Fodder
summary: Get yourself a Hero Squad and survive huge waves of enemies, trying to break the game with mindful choices. DOOMSDAY FODDER combines rogue-lite, autochess, bullet-hell and survival elements in a unique blend of action and strategy.

name: Dogs.Io
summary: Can you create the biggest dog pack?

name: Doggo Walko
summary: A game about taking a dog on a walk!

name: Don't Drink & Drive Simulator 2018
summary: Drinking & Driving. What could possibly go wrong!

name: Dodge This
summary: Gear up for a cinematic 3rd person multiplayer shooter that'll blow your mind. Dual-wield those bad boys and slip into your shootdodging-pants – it's time to unleash explosive slow-motion mayhem!

name: Dollar Dash: More Ways to Win
