It features a ton of file tampering and other meta stuff like exploring the rules behind Club President powers. It also features Natsuki's dad, who is not a sadistic prick, and tries to give each character some limelight.

name: Domovoy
summary:
You are a Dom.0V0Y MDL 2.36. You are a robot vacuum cleaner tasked with maintaining the cleanliness of your owner's home during the night. You must make sure that you collect all of the dust within the house, or you may be returned to the store and/or scrapped for parts. Be wary for any sounds you hear; they may be indications of more dust appearing in the house.

You perceive your surroundings through your advanced LiDar scanner. Pressing space will scan the environment around you, creating a 3d snapshot for you to explore. Keep in mind, picking up dust will not remove the scanned version of it. However, it will not pick up on scans again. Make sure to scan often so that you have a clear view of your surroundings.

name: Doggy
summary: Off-beat hell levels with lots of heavy weapons usage and Spidey vs Cybie showdowns

name: Dogs++
summary: You can never have too many dogs on your head

name: Down Under
summary: 12 speed-mapped Boom compatible levels (-cl 9) restricted to 500 linedefs (except for map12). Explore a desert base and the centre of the Earth with a banging soundtrack drawn from various Sonic games.

name: D or D
summary: D or D is a psychological horror game that immerses you in daily experiences.One page in high school student Xiaoshan's notebook is written with some words starting with the letter "d"

name: Doom: The Way We Remember It
summary:
.. Literally.

Also given the names 'Mandela Doom', 'Doom But Something's Not Right' and 'Doom from Memory', we recreated the whole game from memory.

name: Dora the Explorer: Dance to the Rescue
Downtown Nekketsu Monogatari 2
summary: A sequel to Downtown Nekketsu Story. It was in development at Miracle Kidz but is now on hold indefinitely.

name: Do It With Hay
summary: It’s a little funny game, in which you will be a worker on a small farm. You’re going to unload haystacks in time, since the truck driver won't wait long! Although, no one will prevent you from distracting yourself a little and diluting your work days with something funny.

name: Doctor Robotnik's Creature Capture
summary: This is a hack which changes Sonic the Hedgehog for Genesis into a entirely different game with new gameplay. It stars Dr. Robotnik whom must capture creatures with a net and put them in creature capsules. The graphics are the same as previous Sonic games but the rest is mostly changed. Most levels are open by default.

name: Dots & Co
summary: Explore beautiful landscapes and embark on a visual journey by solving puzzles with magical companions that help you along the way.

name: Don't Buy This
summary:
Don't Buy This is a ZX Spectrum video game compilation released in 1985. As described on the box, it contains five of the poorest games submitted to Firebird.
Instead of rejecting the submissions, they decided to mock the original developers by releasing them together and publicly brand it as "unoriginal" and "awful". Firebird even disowned all their copyright to the game and encouraged buyers to pirate it at will.

name: Dotty
summary: You play as Dotty, a cute little ladybug who can shoot glitter from her fingertips!

name: Dogs of Wall Street
summary: The ultimate dog-based stock market arcade-style party game! Gather up to 4 of your friends and invite the family! Pick a breed, and get those bones!

name: Don't Not Live
summary: Don't Not Live is a precision platformer where you can dash in any direction. Climb to the top of the afterlife to meet god and receive the special prize for completing his hellish obstacle course.

name: Double Dragon 3: The Arcade Game
summary: Only one man knows the real story behind Marion's disappearance... and he's dead! Now the Double Dragons must rely on a mysterious fortune teller to locate Marion and her ransom - the Sacred Stones of Power! You'll fend off vicious street thugs, evil ninja warriors, deadly gladiators, Manchurian barbarians and more! Defeat your most dreaded enemies and out of pure respect they'll join your side - adding their Iron Claws and Shangai Stars to your all-new martial arts maneuvers - like the awesome mid-air somersault. Double Dragon III. If you survive the action, you'll rescue Marion, retain your honor and discover the truth behind the Sacred Stones. If you fail...

name: Doki Doki! RainClouds
summary: Doki Doki! RainClouds is a fan game that makes you play through DDLC’s original Act I with Sayori’s point of view.

name: Doraemon Gadget Rush
summary:
Help Doraemon take back his future gadgets from alien techno-thieves!
Blast the aliens to bits by forming a string of same colored gems on the game board. Form as many gem combos as you can within a given time limit! Chain combos to unleash Fever Time and look for rare power-ups for more points and damage. Unlock Doraemon's friends to help him in battle. Level-up and equip powerful weapons with unique boosts. Defeat all the aliens and retrieve all of Doraemon's 42 stolen future gadgets!

name: Doc Ati
summary: Arcade game taking a stand against the use of childlike features in sexual imagery in video games.

name: Doctor Who Infinity: The Silent Streets of Barry Island
summary: The Silent Streets of Barry Island, penned by Jacqueline Raynor, is drawn by Emma Vieceli and colored by Kris Carter. It features the Eleventh Doctor, Amy Pond and Rory Williams in mods-n-rockers era Barry Island.

name: Doortal
summary: Doortal is a puzzle game that bends reality. What is on the other side of a door depends on what shape you put in. Can you collect all the shapes? Can you visit all the dimensions? How fast can you do it?

name: Dong Dong Never Die: Judgment Day
summary: Dong Dong Never Die, the cult classic fighting game originally released in 2009, makes its triumphant return! Truly, Dong Dong never dies. Judgment Day is a massive overhaul of the entire game that makes radical changes to every character and the game systems. It is the culmination of about 20 months of intermittent work, and we think that it's evolved into something really special.

name: Dokyusei: Bangin' Summer - Home Edition
summary: It’s the ’90s. Summer’s back! Dōkyūsei: Bangin’ Summer brings the heat—a Japanese adventure classic, all decked out in HD graphics.

name: Don't Play With Dolls
summary: Having made his way to the house, which seemed long ago abandoned, in order to steal from it all items of value, the main character understands that the house is not so abandoned.

name: Dora the Explorer
summary:
Dora The Explorer: Race To Play Park is a Plug It In & Play TV Game released by Jakks Pacific in 2005.

The controller consists of a board game named Play Park Race, where before each game you play a memory game called Memory Match.

name: Dolphin Blue
summary: You take on the role of either Ann (a royal army soldier who is out to protect the kingdom) or Erio (an arms dealer with a thirst for action). The game is set in the future and it appears a major incident has transformed what used to be a peace-filled nation into a troubled land of waste and ruin. What exactly has happened in this land remains unknown but whatever it was, it has damaged the earth's surface. Now the entire location is immersed in water. Our gallant heroes must now protect the earth's remains from the dastardly evil empire that are planning to take over the world. Dolphin Blue is an action side-scrolling shoot-em up with great graphics, super sound and gripping gameplay that will leave you sitting on the edge of your dolphin!

name: Donkey Kong
summary: The Coleco Adam port of Donkey Kong was developed by Coleco and released in 1984.

name: DokiDoki LoveUnholyc Class
summary: DokiDoki LoveUnholyc Class is a casual simulation game developed by Prettybusy. In this game, players can enjoy cute and relaxing gameplay with a variety of features. Players can collect different dolls, play with the claw machine, watch different episodes of the story and decorate the lobby in the game.

name: Doomsday Room
summary: A fictional geopolitical game set during a fictional Cold War.

name: Don't Get Angry! 2
summary: A European PC game released in 2006, Don't Get Angry! 2 is a board game akin to Sorry.

name: Donkey Kong 3-e
summary:
Donkey Kong 3-e is the e-Reader port of the NES version of Donkey Kong 3.
It was distributed as a set of five e-Cards which had to be scanned with the peripheral in order to play the game on the Game Boy Advance.
It is part of a series of ports of NES games for the e-Reader.

name: Doctor Who: The Adventure Games - Episode 4: Shadows of the Vashta Nerada
summary: The fourth episode of the Doctor Who Adventure Games series sees the Doctor encountering the deadly Vashta Nerada on Posidon 8, an underwater base.

name: Doom Tomb
summary: Cut to the chase with Doom Tomb! A chase-based PvP arena game. Catch, evade and outplay your opponents in this 3D arena filled with obstacles! Chose from a selection of abilities and items that will suit your playstyle.

name: DooM in the Dark 2
summary: The space station suffered an unknown infection from space, the previously unknown X virus mutates, almost the entire crew of the station is infected, you need to stop the army of mutants until they break through to Earth and the judgment day begins!

name: DomiDo
summary: Make your own domino show, DomiDo allows an unique experience by toppling domino pieces.

name: Dora the Explorer: Nursery Rhyme Adventure
summary:
Dora The Explorer: Nursery Rhyme Adventure is a Plug It In & Play TV Game released by Jakks Pacific in 2005.

Other game names are indicated on the packaging: Dora's Nursery Rhyme Adventure and Dora the Explorer 2.

There is a story mode, as well as the ability to run mini-games.

name: DoDodge2020
summary: a simple bullet dodge game with customizable content.

name: Doom II: The Sentinel's Lexicon
summary:
This project is intended to be a megawad complation that will contain some of the most pouplar and fun mapsets. This will also contain short mapsets also.

It will also contain a hub map where players can vote on the mapset to play on.

name: Do or Die
summary:
Fight against each other in intense VR Battle Royale skirmishes in Do or Die!
Conquer the battlefield and escape with your life!
Drop in an island full of weapons to equip, survive until the end or fight to escape alive!

name: Doomed: By the Hour 2
summary: Doomed: By The Hour 2 is a megawad with 32 speedmaps created between 1-3 hours by finnks13 & Yumheart, with a special guest map by gabirupee. Maps are generally pretty short & violent, with a nice slaughtery finale in the last two episodes being generally equivalent to Speed of Doom.

name: Dork
summary: Leave the safety of your village and embark on the journey of adventure! By traveling through eight different and unique locations discover the forgotten history of your people and the tragedy that led to the creation of your civilization. Welcome to the world of Dork!

name: Dolphin Defense
summary: Enter the DOLPHINVERSE and hang out for a while. Take in the sunset, enter Tunnel Force Vortex, and play the Dolphin Defense Adventure!

name: Dodge Hard
summary: Presenting Dodge Hard! An exciting bullet hell shooting game featuring cute pixel art characters!

name: Don't Die Mr Robot! DX
summary:
Don’t Die, Mr. Robot! DX is a remixed version of the much-loved arcade bullet-hell avoid ‘em up, completely remastered and rejuvenated for Nintendo Switch.

Deep in the electro-abyss lives a little robot who loves to eat exploding fruit. He also likes staying alive. That’s where you come in…

Get the fruit. Avoid the enemies. Try not to die. (Spoilers: you will die)

name: Doomed: By the Hour
summary: A full megawad of speedmaps that were (mostly!) made in an hour or less, for NaNoWADMo 2022! The standard 30 maps are split evenly between us, with Map31 being a collaboration and Map32 being a guest map by gabirupee!

name: Donut Be Seen
summary: Help our alien kitten reach area 51, and do not be seen.

name: DogFight Time
summary: Dogfight Time is an aerial racing game with shooting mechanics. Race your opponents into the finish line, picking up objects to destroy opponents planes or protecting your plane from damage. Earn in-game money by completing matches, unlock new planes to race with.

name: Donkey Kong: Jumpman Returns
summary:
Remember the old good times?
This hack don't have Midwaypoint so, be careful
Jumpman is back, now let's go for Pauline

Who high can you get?

name: Doom: Damnation
summary:
Doom: Damnation (DDAMN10.WAD) is a full four-episode replacement vanilla megawad, for The Ultimate Doom. It was released in February 2021, following an initial three-episode release in November 2016. It was designed by Ofisil, who also composed the soundtrack for it.
This mapset acts as a retelling of the original events that unfolded in The Ultimate Doom; the maps are designed with traditional gameplay in mind, combining action, exploration and atmosphere on abstract and semi-realistic environments, with the custom made OST occasionally adding a slight horror vibe.

name: Do Animals Dream?
summary: You’re shipwrecked on a mysterious island of talking animals! You’ll need to make friends with the local critters if you hope to return home. This adventure includes memorable conversations, exploration, multiple endings, and dark secrets...

name: Dora the Explorer: Carnival 2 - Boardwalk Adventure
Double Edged
summary: Play as Spartan soldiers that are invading enemy territory in order to rescue their princess. Fight mythical bosses and enemies with a variety of weapons.

name: Doctor Who: Into the Vortex
summary:
Fly the TARDIS. How far can you travel in time?

Control the TARDIS as you travel through the time vortex. Collect blue energy particles to temporarily fuel the TARDIS and avoid red particles that will disrupt the fuel cells. If you lose all your energy, the TARDIS will fall out of the vortex and rematerialise at a location in space and time.

name: Dontbegrey
summary: Dontbegrey is a minimalistic hardcore platformer with experimental color-themed mechanics, where you can choose what is an obstacle and what is the background.

name: Doctor Watson - Treasure Island
summary: Players will experience an exciting adventure as Dr. Watson at fantastic locations. The first part of this new 3D hidden object series takes players to the famous Treasure Island. In this adventure, players solve exciting puzzles and interact with a varied landscape and many locations. As a special bonus, the adventure can be played with 3-D glasses in real 3D. But even without 3D glasses an addictive Hidden Object game awaits the player.

name: Docking Doom
summary: Duke is a regular cargo inspector, sent to orbiting space docks to check for illegal cargo. As a routine check up on the dock station, Zero Alpha, finds Duke uninterested, a sudden distress signal comes up for only a second. Duke grabs his pistol and locks and loads.

name: Doom II: Ascension
summary:
The Ascension is the direct heir of Inquisitor III. A modified RPG system, which was developed for the first time for The Inquisitor III, is used.
The world of Khorus needs a hero once more! You have been summoned to this world to fulfill your destiny. Only you can decide how the great prophecy will take its course. But, in order to deal with the fate of the world, you need to master powerful weapons and magic, and for that you will need to regularly increase your character attributes. Therefore, search for teachers all over the world — they will be willing to help you for a certain price.

name: DonDon Busters!!
summary: DonDon Busters!! is a local multiplayer game that brings you head to head with up to three other players in a chaotic and fun free-for-all! Last one to remain standing on land is the winner; so blast everyone that isn't you out of bounds, and get ready to DonDon!!

name: Doodle TD 2
summary: Doodle TD Is back and better than before, Place and smack enemies down with force in this brand new tower defense game. We added color from the original game as the evil mastermind has colored the world of doodle land.

name: Doraemon no Study Boy 3: Ku Ku Master
summary: Doraemon no Study Boy 3: Ku Ku Master is an edutainment game, developed and published by Fujicom, which was released in Japan in 1997.

name: Donkey Kong Heardle
summary:
A clone of Heardle for Donkey Kong music.

Each Donkey Kong Heardle is randomly chosen from Donkey Kong's discography.

name: Don't Eat the Mushroom
summary: A short mod of Knytt Stories where a young girl is asked to deliver a package for her mother. Adds in new levels, music, and a few other surprises!

name: Dodge
summary: Dodge is an arcade scoring game.

name: Doomed
summary: Doomed is a First Person Shooter with horror elements, heavily inspired by old-school shooter classics.

name: Docking Donuts2 in 1
summary:
You should sell the donuts ordered.
You'll be supplied with donuts one by one.
Then you just lay it in the tray.
Of course, you should not lay it carelessly.
To sell and get money,
Just put three or more donuts together then the donuts will be sold(removed).
As time goes on, the screen will be filled with the donuts from the bottom.
Sell the donuts ordered before it is overflowing.

name: Dogville
summary: Another day, another city overrun by the alien hordes. You start in an apartment, lightly armed, and as you look out the window, you not only get to enjoy some enemies trying to plug you full of holes, you get to enjoy an incredible view.

name: Doraemontchi
summary: The Doraemontchi is a licensed Tamagotchi that was released exclusively in Japan in August 1998. It is based on the anime and manga series Doraemon.

name: Don't Boop My Booper
summary: An action game in which players must click as many otter noses as they can to rack up their score.

name: Dots: Revamped!
summary: Based on the insanely popular Flash Game Dots! Dots: Revamped!

name: Doodle Fit
summary: Puzzle game addiction meets doodle-style graphics! Your task is simple: fit the given sets of blocks into given shapes. Drag the blocks inside and outside in search for the layout that covers the whole shape. A level is complete when all blocks have been used and there's no more space free in the shape.

name: Donkey Kong Country: Barrel Maze
summary: Donkey Kong Country: Barrel Maze, or Donkey Kong Barrel Maze, is a browser game developed by Skyworks Interactive (formerly Skyworks Technologies) and published on their website, Candystand.com, under Nintendo's endorsement. It requires Adobe Shockwave to run. The game is based on elements from Donkey Kong Country and has Donkey Kong in a quasi-starring role, with Diddy Kong and Cranky Kong only making cameo appearances on the title and loading screens. The player controls a barrel loaded with bananas and has to roll it through a series of obstacles to reach DK at the end of every stage in the game.

name: Donsol
summary:
A dungeon-crawler game built around a deck of 54 cards.

This is a demake of Donsol by John Eternal and Hundred Rabbits in PICO-8.

name: Doomer7
summary: a Killer7 themed Doom mod

name: Dolphin's Dream
summary: Free-roaming scuba diving game exclusively for PlayStation.

name: Doza 2: Novogodniy Peredoz
summary: Embark on a magical land, ruled by the good magician Ratinder to help him to quell the uprising of snowmen and overcome the evil dark wizard Lord Oval

name: Doctor's Orders
summary:
What secret plots might be hiding in an otherwise peaceful hospital? And where is your romance with the handsome doctors leading?
This is a love story set in a hospital full of handsome doctors, spine-tingling suspense, and lots of drama!

name: Doki-doki Penguin Land
summary:
Doki-doki Penguin Land is a 1985 game initially developed by Sega for the SG-1000. It is a platform-based puzzle game, where a penguin must guide an egg down the screen making sure not to break it.

The basic aim of Doki-doki Penguin Land is to guide an egg from the top of the screen to the bottom. To do so means digging downwards, making sure it does not smash in the process. As a puzzle-platformer, everything is affected by gravity, and if the egg falls from a great height, it will smash. Success is achieved by making your way down the playfield carefully.

You control a penguin. 1 jumps, 2 digs. The penguin can push the egg left or right, and can jump on it to make sure it doesn't get stuck against a wall. Digging affects the tile one block left (or right) and one block down away from the penguin's position, meaning it is impossible to dig straight downwards. If the egg gets into a position where it cannot be moved left or right, jumping and landing on it will cause it to smash.

The penguin cannot be damaged, but can be temporarily stunned, the objective being to protect the egg, not necessarily yourself. If the player leaves the screen from the bottom he/she will emerge from the top.

name: DogeFight
summary: DogeFight is a third-person multiplayer game where you can play with your favorite memes and be the last survivor by defeating your opponents, and gaining social credit. But be careful not to be sus.

name: Doraemon: Minna de Asobou! Minidorando
summary: Doraemon: Minna de Asobou! Minidorando is an Action game, developed by Agenda and published by Epoch, which was released in Japan in 2003.

name: Dominion: Guilds
summary: Guilds is the 8th expansion to Dominion. It adds 13 new Kingdom cards to Dominion. It has coin tokens that you can save to spend later, and cards you can get more out of by paying extra for them.

name: Dot Dash Dot
summary: "You were the only applicant. You have been accepted. Please report to Locke Key by Monday." Take the role of a lighthouse operator, and use your spacebar to send Morse code messages to ships in the sea.

name: Don't Mess With Nanny
summary: In Don't mess with Nanny there are 2 players, the cranky Nanny and a child. Nanny's objective is to complete multiple tasks in the household while the evil kid tries to stop her at any costs.

name: Doodle Jump for Kinect
summary: Doodle Jump for Kinect is a game in the Doodle Jump series for the Xbox 360 which uses the Xbox Kinect for movement.

name: Don King Presents: Prizefighter
summary: Don King Presents: Prizefighter is a boxing video game for the Xbox 360. The game was met with mixed reviews upon its release.

name: Dot Arcade
summary: Three full-color games, including Dodge Club, Rally Driver, and Mr. Snake

name: Down.
summary: A short, somber, narrative experience about depression and anxiety

name: Domum
summary: Unravel the dark past of a once beautiful estate in this disturbing top-down adventure game. Solve puzzles, unlock multiple endings, and experience imagery you will never forget as you determine the fate of those that tormented you.

name: Doctor Who: Monster Invasion - Vortex Run
summary: Amy Pond and the Eleventh Doctor are on a spaceship on Kaydon 36 when the Time Vortex rips through space. The Eleventh Doctor reaches the TARDIS in time, but Amy is left on the ship and has to run for her life. The Doctor needs to teleport Amy safely back into the TARDIS.

name: DoxyLanD
summary: The only roguelike-rpg-quest-driven with multiple endings that you will play!

name: Domino Killer
summary: Domino is a board game in which a chain of dice is built, in contact with halves with the same number of dots. This game has two game modes: player vs. AI and AI vs. AI.

name: Downtown Smash Dodgeball!
summary: Downtown Smash Dodgeball! is an Xbox Live Indie game, inspired by Super Dodge Ball.

name: Doctor Who: Don't Blink
summary: Can your webcam save you from the Weeping Angels in this spooky mini-game? The Angels can only get you when you’re not looking at them so 'don’t blink' and hold on until the Doctor sends the TARDIS for you. Too difficult? Too easy? Don't forget to rate and share.

name: Doctor Who: Monster Invasion - Ultimate Match-up
summary: The game is a memory game during which you have to click on the gird to reveal DWMI Ultimate cards. All cards have to be matched-up with the card pairs as fast as possible to get a good high score.

name: Doctor Who: Monster Invasion - Dalek Supremacy
summary: The Daleks have to exterminate their enemies, the Silurians, the Sontarans and the Cybermen.

name: Doctor Who: Monster Invasion - The Keys of Time
summary: A Graske has stolen a key to the TARDIS. He's had it copied and scattered the copied keys around the universe. The Eleventh Doctor's mission is it to track down all keys before his enemies use them to steal the TARDIS.

name: Donkey Kong
summary: The Commodore VIC-20 port of Donkey Kong was developed by Atari, Inc., under the Atarisoft label.

name: Dora the Explorer: Dora Saves the Mermaids
summary: Dora and Boots need your help bringing a magic crown back to Mariana the Mermaid. Travel over land and sea to save her kingdom from a mean, garbage-dumping Octopus! Then help Dora dive to the rescue when she magically becomes a mermaid herself!

name: Doctor Who: Jobsworth Judoon
summary:
The Tenth Doctor must return to his TARDIS which the Judoons have locked due to illegal parking.

He has to break the security codes around the forcefield holding the TARDIS and escape.

name: Doctor Who: Monster Invasion - Maze of the Dead
summary: The Eleventh Doctor has reached the Maze of the Dead. He has to race through the chambers, dodge the Weeping Angels and scan the boxes to reach the Byzantium space ship. Furthermore the batteries of his torch run out after some time, he needs to scan the boxes for spares. If it's completely dark the Weeping Angels attack.

name: Doctor Who: Cyber Assault
summary: In Pete's World, after the destruction of the Cyber-Controller, a new Cyber-Leader appears and wages war against the Preachers, who are attempting to destroy the Cybus factories across the world, sending in soldiers to disable the emotional inhibitors.

name: Dora the Explorer
summary: Dora the Explorer is a game for the Leapster.

name: Doors: Origins
summary: Earth as we know it is now on a path of destruction. A sky of constantly shifting colors, floods in places where the rain never stops, and when the snow falls it is gray. All seemed lost until we discovered a mysterious portal. An outstanding 3D puzzle escape game that you don't want to miss!

name: Double Puzzled
summary:
Two puzzle games for the entire family. Play Single player Ghost Sweeper or Rusty Spout Rescue Adventure. Rusty Spout Rescue Adventure features local two player mode so you can also challenge others.

Ghost Sweeper features eight world with 8 levels in each world with secret levels.

Rusty Spout Rescue Adventure, the most colorful puzzle game ever. Story mode, Endless mode and 2 Battle mode where you can play against a friend in local multiplayer.

name: Doctor Who: Land the Tardis
summary:
We're probably crashing, so put your piloting skills to the test. Use your keyboard to fly the Tardis through the vortex to London, unlocking some clips along the way. This game is best played on a desktop computer.

Just one question: do you happen to know how to fly this thing?

name: Donkey Kong 3: Another Rise!
summary: Another and the final rise, After the events of DK2 The rise of jumpman, Jumpman decides to take another chance againt DK.

name: Doomdark's Revenge
summary: Those of you who took up their challenge and rode with them to battle against the cruel Witchking will need no reminding of that epic struggle. But now a new epic tale unfolds, the story of Doomdark’s Revenge.

name: Doki-Doki Universe: Limited Edition Bundle
summary: Get Doki-Doki Universe™ Limited Edition Bundle PS3™, Action game for PS3 console from the official PlayStation® website. Know more about Doki-Doki Universe™ Limited Edition Bundle PS3™ Game.

name: Downhill Deceits
summary: Downhill Deceits is a fun game where you play as a quiet man on an orange bike who goes down because an old man told him to, and there are islands. Uncover this amazing story by following one rule: Go Down!

name: Double Strike
summary: The South Pacific contains some of the most beautiful islands in the world, and they have all been invaded by a terrorist organization called DAMED (Destructive Armed Militant Enemy Devotee). You must fly an experimental fighter jet called the Thrasher Hawk-7 to battle the enemy and rid them from nine different islands. To help out, six different power ups can be collected after destroying certain enemies which provide better weapons, bombs, or extra lives.

name: Doramitchi
summary: An alternate version of the Doraemontchi which has different characters but is functionally identical.

name: Doki Doki Storm
summary: Doki Doki Storm is a mod for Doki Doki Literature Club intended to be a character study of Yuri, told entirely from her point of view, showcasing her struggles with fitting in, her feelings of self-loathing, her escapism into fantasy, her attempts to overcome her self-harm habit, and her eventual descent into madness. Don't let that screenshot above fool you; this is a very dark mod, rather different from my previous work, in that it deals with deep emotional pain and gets quite bloody. Even if you enjoyed my previous work, please use your discretion when playing. Be safe and pace yourself if you need to.

name: Doom 95
summary: Doom95 is an official port of Doom to the Microsoft Windows operating system, and is included in many later releases of The Ultimate Doom, Doom II, and Final Doom.

name: Doors
summary: Doors is a story based first person shooter game in which the protagonist awakes in a seemingly endless void and must persist through his delusions to discover the truth about his fate and understand why he is there.

name: Double Spoiler: Touhou Bunkachou
summary: Double Spoiler: Touhou Bunkachou is a danmaku vertical-scrolling photography game and the "12.5th" official installment of the Touhou Project. It was released between Touhou Hisoutensoku (12.3) and Fairy Wars (12.8). It is a follow-up to Shoot the Bullet, which is similar in both gameplay and concept.

name: Doom II
summary: A remaster of the original Xbox version of Doom II. The Doom II port includes the Xbox bonus level, Betray. However, it is inaccessible.

name: Doom 3: Resurrection of Evil
summary: A standalone release of the expansion Doom 3: Resurrection of Evil. It includes the main game, the expansion, The Ultimate Doom (Xbox port, with its extra stage), Doom II (Xbox port, with its extra stage) and Master Levels for Doom II.

name: Downtown Texas Hold'em Poker
summary: A Texas Hold'em game for the DSiWare shop

name: Donut Get!
summary: The Donut Shoppe is ablaze, Donuts are raining from the sky and citizens occupy the streets. Officer Brown must create order by eating as many donuts as he can until the fire department comes.

name: Door Slammers
summary:
Heat up your tires with long smokey burnouts and when the green light drops launch full throttle with your wheels in the air! Push your skills to the limit rapidly accelerating to over 200 mph all the while doing your best to keep from smoking the tires or blowing your engine on a tricky racing surface.
Pray your engine and chassis tuning are just right as you try to be the first to pilot across the finish line... but don't forget to pull the chute as you stand on the brakes before flying off the end of the track and into the sand traps!
Hone your reaction and ET as you strive for the perfect run in the bracket classes or drive on the edge of sanity in the heads up and grudge racing events.
Race online with your friends or around the world in live multiplayer action.
AMAZING 3D GRAPHICS
Smokey Burnouts, Header Flames, Nitrous Purges, Wheels Up Launches, Functional Parachute, Gear Shifting, Custom Paint, Hood Scoop, Wings and Wheelie Bars.

name: Donkey Kong GB: Dinky Kong & Dixie Kong
summary:
Fame-and-fortune seekers have flooded Donkey Kong Country in search of the fabled Lost World. You command Dixie Kong and Kiddy Kong through 36 Kong-sized levels of action and adventure. Use your animal friends - Squitter the spider, Squawks the parrot, Ellie the elephant, Enguarde the swordfish and Parry the parallel bird - to help you prove your adventuring skills and find the Lost World before someone else does!

In this updated version of Donkey Kong Land III, enjoy the classic adventure now in full color exclusively released in Japan.

name: Doggins
summary: Enter the dream world of a terrier and conquer an evil squirrel's puzzles.

name: Doomworld Forums 3
summary: This WAD tells the true story of what REALLY happened in the recent episode at the NewDooM forums. My sources are infallible, so don't even try to dismiss any of this as false, because it is the cold, hard truth and it will hit you like a speeding bus in the middle of a rainy night. It's that powerful.

name: Doraemon: Nobita's Resident Evil
summary: Doraemon: Nobita's Resident Evil is an RPG maker game that's set up to play like a Resident Evil game starring characters from the Doraemon anime exploring a school during a zombie apocalypse.

name: Donkey Kong Jr.
summary: A simulator of the Game & Watch Panorama Screen version of Donkey Kong Jr.

name: Doraemon Kart 2
summary: Doraemon, Nobita and all their friends are back on the race track! Challenge the grand prix and win the cup!

name: Dokodemo Mahjong
summary: Doko Demo Mahjong is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by ADK, which was released in Japan in 1999.

name: Don't Call Me Mama But Yes I Am Your Mama
Dopamine
summary: The roguelike where desires and temptations manifest tangibly, and where the pursuit of pleasure can become a trap, break free from the shackles of temptation as you strive to achieve your aspirations and overcome the obstacles that haunt you!

name: Doctor Flow
summary: Doctor Flow is a puzzle game of deduction and decision making. You assume the role of a doctor who decides which tests are performed on patients and in what order. Keep in mind cost efficiency, patient satisfaction and quality of healthcare. Choose wisely!

name: Doppel Diner
summary: In an alternate 1950s universe, there is a small spaceship diner, where the position of the orbit determines its interior environment. Explore three distinct gameplay challenges that metaphorically represent the real euthymic, manic, and depressive mood episodes of bipolar disorder.

name: Domino Master
summary: Xbox LIVE Multiplayer 2-4, HD (High Definition). Upgrade now to unlock the full-featured, multiplayer Domino Master game! Play against friends and family, or challenge the world on Xbox LIVE. The full version also includes achievements, leaderboards, and LiveVision support!

name: Down the Deep
summary:
In this game, you can feel like an undper, and most importantly stay alive!

Here you should pay attention to almost everything! Control your oxygen level, watch out for obstacles, do not bump into walls. And remember: Keep Up!

name: Dogbite!
summary: You are a postman and you need to make 10 deliveries on your route without being bitten by a dog.

name: DogWorld Premium
summary:
The absolute cuddle alarm for your iPad or iPhone: Tivola brings the next installment of its 3D animal game series with DogWorld 3D’s cute Dalmatian, Labrador, Shepherd, Rottweiler and Beagle puppies. You’ll have little, faithful companions by your side to share all kinds of crazy adventures with.


UNENDING GAME FUN 

The little puppies are always with you and are always delighted when you take care of them, give them treats, or just simply cuddle them. Each puppy reacts to your touch, and you will be amazed by the incredibly adorable animations in amazing 3D graphics. With your finger, you can nudge your new friend slowly out of his dreams so that he happily jumps on the screen or begs on command with a wagging tail. While doing this he is always ready to cuddle or play and he's always in an intoxicatingly good mood. It only takes one look in his faithful little button eyes for you to fall under his spell and to give him attention, which he adores.


CLUMSY DANCING

You thought that you can't really rock out with dogs? You thought wrong: Pump up the stereo system together with your little Dalmatian, Labrador, and Beagle, and you can marvel at their clumsy dance moves. Depending on the mood, you can choose from different songs and decide which funny moves the puppies perform to the rhythm. A good mood is guaranteed!


FUNNY CLOTHING

The little puppies love it when you search for funny accessories in the wardrobe room so that you can dress them up. Hats, shoes, bows and other things are ready so that you can get started with costuming right away. Your fantasies have no limits; decorate your darling according to your imagination. If you are happy with the result, then you can create a photographic memory of the experience. Let your dog pose for the camera and create unforgettable snapshots.


COLLECT STARS TO ENSURE THAT YOU RECEIVE SURPRISES

You collect stars with every mission. Once you've reached a certain amount, a cool surprise waits for you each time. Cool dog accessories such as treats and toys are hidden in the gift packets for unending game fun with your new friend.

Play DogWorld 3D now and care for your own cute puppy dogs!

Tivola’s premium games offer players endless gaming fun with their favorite animals, without any in-app purchases, annoying ads, or external links. This is why premium games are perfectly suited for even our littlest animal fans. For a set price, you can get all the content and all the objects in the game from the start – just waiting to be played with! What are you waiting for? Let’s start playing!

REVIEWS

"If your kids are begging for a puppy after watching 101 Dalmatians, you might want to get them this app for fun. [...] Cute and funny! [...] The dog itself and his environment are very realistically presented through 3D animations." (smartappsforkids.com)

name: Dodgerman
summary: Once, when you spent time with your girlfriend … An incident occurred … “Why do you have two toothbrushes?” Another girl forgot one of these here You need some kind of redemption. Try to wiggle out of this dangerous situation! All outcomes of these bloody amorous battles depends on your decisions!

name: Don't Blink
summary: DON'T BLINK is a Virtual Reality horror game where you escape an from an INFINITE basement. Run from a creature that CAN'T MOVE WHILE YOU WATCH. The creatures only move when you can't see, so keep a close eye and DON'T BLINK.

name: Douga de Kiku Ano Kyoku no Rhythm Game
summary: 動画で聞いたことがあるあの曲でリズムゲームを楽しもう！ あの異変探しゲーム『2番線 | Nibansen』『3番線 | Sanbansen』の制作陣が送る新作動画系リズムアクションゲーム！

name: Don't Melt the Snowman
summary: ​A festive hangman type word game which is fun to play - but Don't Melt the Snowman

name: Doler
summary: Doler is a game about being a mouse in a giant spooky maze filled with treasure and scary spiders where you search for a big stash of food. The maze resets everyday and is the same for all players. You can communicate with other players by leaving messages in your droppings! Can you find the goal?

name: Do Not Pass Go
summary: monopoly parody horror game

name: Dodge the Ball
summary: Dodge the incoming balls and collect diamonds and score the highest score.

name: Doggo Garden Defense
summary: Critters are on their way to eat your carrots! Recruit fearsome Doggos to shoo them away in this casual yet strategic Tower Defense game. Defend your garden across a variety of different levels, each with four difficulty modes. Can you save your crops, or will the Critters win?

name: Double Symbol
summary: It is a card game in which all of the cards are laid face down on a surface and two cards are flipped face up over each turn. The object of the game is to turn over pairs of matching cards. It is a particularly good game for young children, though adults may find it challenging and stimulating as well. The scheme is often used in quiz shows and can be employed as an educational game.

name: Doggie Ninja: The Golden Mission
summary: "Doggie Ninja The Golden Mission" is a PvP action game up to 4 players can play. Let's enjoy this game with anyone, anytime, and anywhere! - Break the castle!! Crush the rivals! Let's throw the wall blocks to break the castle! But watch out! If you break all the blocks holding the roof, the roof will fall down! Once the falling roof hits a Doggie Ninja, He/she will be blown away!

name: Doeo
summary: You’ll need a sharp eye and fast fingers to master Doeo! This online action game gets you grabbing as many Doeos as you can before the clock runs down. Mouse over to catch them as quickly as possible before they disappear. Catch your quota to advance to the next hilarious level. Make it to the sixth and final level to take on the boss. I bet you’ll laugh… at least once!

name: Don't Even Think
summary: Don't even think is a survival game with the core of multilateral asymmetric confrontation. Players will experience a strong tension from the pressure of survival, as well as the newly-defined 'escape' and 'kill'. When being involved in a tight game, it is absolutely never wise to fight alone. Proper cooperation always create unexpected results. Collecting information, analyzing and implementing strategy is also the key to be a winner.

name: Dog Walking, Dog Running, and Dog Still
summary: A tiny pixelated story of an autumn dog walk.

name: Dogs Cyberpuzzle
summary: A jigsaw puzzle with videos of dogs in a cyberpunk atmosphere. Beat the clock and find out what Kitty's message is.

name: Dottania
summary:
Each protagonist has a different goal, which is not only to develop the town, but also to listen to the needs of the residents. You can also enjoy mini-games such as fishing.
In addition, each country has a different culture and a different landscape depending on the lords you choose.

name: Donkey Kong vs. K. Rool Challenge
Dominus Galaxia
summary: Dominus Galaxia is a 4X space strategy game with a focus on amplifying strategic decisions and minimising non-strategic busywork.

name: Doraemon: Nobita to Yousei no Kuni
summary: Doraemon: Nobita to Yousei no Kuni is an Action game, developed by SAS Sakata and published by Epoch, which was released in Japan in 1993.

name: Dodge the Missionaries
summary: How long can you run from God?!

name: Dominate Square
summary: 4つの属性を的確に配置し、相手の駒を奪いましょう。

name: Don't touch me
summary:
Don’t touch me is a fast paced third person experience where the goal is to not get touched by any zombies, while Also navigating numerous fun maps, with zombies coming your way. The game is split with 6 survival maps and an Arena mode, split screen multiplayer, and online leaderboards and so you can try to be the best in the world! 
Made in the unreal engine by a solo developer

name: Doom Hockey
summary:
Doom Hockey is a GZDoom multiplayer mod that brings exciting ice rink action into Doom! Up to four players can play on the Red or Blue teams, all while various items appear on the rink to shoot at the puck (or the other team). Each match can be customized in game. Play with a 5 minute timer and see which team
gets more goals, or turn the timer off and play a Best of 5.

name: Doctor Who: The First Adventure
summary: Featuring the Fifth Doctor, this is the first video game produced based on the UK TV Doctor Who series. Released for the BBC Micro, it is similar to a mini-game collection.

name: Don't Shoot Rabbit
summary: Don’t Shoot Rabbit is a mini game, as my first completed game product. Though I didn’t provide English UI support, it won't be too difficult to understand how to play it. One round may take 3-5 minutes to play, to win all trophy it may take 0.5-1 hour, or maybe more. Compete with your friends, win a high score, and play fun!

name: Doctor Who: Lost in Time
summary:
Power-up your Waypoints to obtain the mysterious Vortex Energy, a crucial force used to thwart the Doctor’s most fearsome foes.
Travel to classic locations from the franchise, and team up with your favorite companions! Together you’ll face enemies like the Daleks, Cybermen and many more! Collect character cards and use strange new resources like Kyfred Gems and Henoch Matter to level up your companions. These resources are key to discovering why the Doctor and friends find themselves lost in time.

name: Dojo Corridor
summary: In this action-packed first person runner, you have to run as a ninja through a narrow corridor full of dangerous traps.

name: Dollal Simulator 2018
summary: The most authentic stock exchange simulator. Buy and sell Dollals in order to become a millionaire!

name: Don't Touch My Phone
summary: In a world where phones rule and tech worries us, 'Don't Touch My Phone' offers a light escape from and into our tech-filled lives. It's not about leaving the digital stuff; instead, it camouflages, making us open to explore new stories that would be untold without the existence of technology

name: Donkey Kong Junior
summary: This is the port for Atari home computers (8-bit family) of the arcade game Donkey Kong Junior.

name: Doki Doki Meme Club
summary: Are you tired of playing through depressing mods that have a heartbreaking ending? Or just burnt out on having to deal with all of the horrors that the characters must endure? Want to flip the sadness on its head? Then this mod is a must-see for you! The club members delve into the wonderful world of memes rather than literature, yet still have their own quirky problems to deal with

name: Down to Hell
summary: Down to hell is a dynamic slasher in which lone swordsman must face the hordes of hellish demons. Moreover Down to Hell will give you truly Heavy F’N Metal experience.

name: Dojo Assault
summary: A scientific experiment to create the ultimate modern samurai is taking place ! Battle to create the unsurpassed warrior ninja assassin in the cloning dojo! Cut, stab and shoot your way to shinobi excellence !

name: Dokopa
summary: Dokopa is an online party game.

name: DoReMi-ya no Original Sound Witch: Blue Sound Witch
summary: DoReMi-ya Original Sound Witch is a SoundLink compatible game for the Satellaview from the Milon series.

name: Dog vs Cat Othello
summary: Cute Growth-Based OthelloA growth-based Othello game featuring cute dog and cat characters. Flip your opponent's character and evolve my character into stronger one! Playable in both single-player and local two-player modes.

name: Doug's Auto Repair
summary: When you're the worst rated mechanic in the city, it's time to drum up business the old fashioned way.

name: Donny Donut 3
summary: Donny's new adventure is taking you to the Cyber Lands, to save the world from the evil Mark Donald. With the help of Pixie, a pixel, Donny's going to travel through cities, data and clouds to find Donno and Donna, his siblings...

name: Dot Gobbler
summary: A Commodore 64 Pac-Man clone.

name: Doraemon Memories: Nobita no Omoide Daibouken
summary:
The game was produced and released in conjunction with the 30 year anniversary event of Doraemon's manga. The purpose is to collect "memorial shots," which are excerpts of comics in action scenes inserted between scenes while watching dialogue between characters.

The package illustrations are the anime pictures of the time, but the in-game graphics and settings such as calling Shizuka Minamoto "Shizu-chan" are in compliance with the manga, and there are dialogue scenes and quizzes that can not be understood without perusing the manga, making this a unique game that is clearly different in its target audience than before.

name: Doomsday Hero
summary: This is a zombie shooting game, shooting zombies can help you relieve pressure, bring happiness.

name: Dodge
summary: Use your mouse to move around the game area avoiding cubes and getting the highest score you can set. Your score only depends by your reflexes and skills, so if you lose, the bad is all yours. Enjoy!

name: DodoGo! Robo
summary: Over 65 million years ago on Dodo Island, a robo-dodo has arrived from the future.

name: Doraemon: Aruke Aruke Labyrinth
summary: Doraemon: Aruke Aruke Labyrinth is a 1999 video game developed and published by Epoch for the Game Boy Color exclusively in Japan.

name: Don't Choke
summary: Don't Choke is a challenging yet simplistic Rhythm Game that simulates the experience of maintaining a steady heart-rate and reducing your anxiety before high pressure sporting competition.

name: Donkey Kong-e
summary:
Donkey Kong-e is the e-Reader port of the NES version of Donkey Kong.

It was distributed as a set of five e-Cards which had to be scanned with the peripheral in order to play the game on the Game Boy Advance.

It is part of a series of ports of NES games for the e-Reader.

name: Dots & Co: A Puzzle Adventure
summary: Explore beautiful landscapes and embark on a visual journey by solving puzzles with magical companions that help you along the way.

name: Doubts
summary: Was running away the right decision?

name: Doctor Who: The Adventure Games - Episode 2: Blood of the Cybermen
summary: The second in a series of four episodic adventure games from the BBC, featuring the Eleventh Doctor and Amy Pond. Blood of the Cybermen also features another classic Doctor Who enemy, The Cybermen.

name: Doom & Destiny Worlds: Damsels & Dragons
summary: Summon 3 playable heroines, sail to 9 uncharted islands, fight powerful horrors and craft epic gear in your final adventure!

name: Domvs
summary: A gothic mystery game in which you rely on your environment to uncover the truth. Contains religious content, multiple endings, optional audio, and lots of Latin.

name: Downtown Run
summary: A vehicular combat game, feautring many different cars, game modes and tracks. In most game modes, you can collect power-ups to maximise your chance of winning or slow down opponents.

name: Doomsday on Demand
summary: Survive in the demolished district after the nuclear bombings. Face mutants born of the nuclear radiation, while dealing with what humans are left in the struggle for the hope to end your living nightmare. Decide who you'll trust and overcome the challenges that await you.

name: Downhill Challenge
summary: Sports winter style.

name: Dont Buzz
summary:
Drag the ring from the left side to the right side without touching the wires !

the game has 4 different mode :

- Normal Mode : has 10 different levels .

- Winter Mode : has 10 different levels .

- Dark Mode : has 10 different levels .

- Endless Mode .

What is your best score ??

name: Doubutsu no Shima no Chobi Gurumi
summary: Doubutsu no Shima no Chobi Gurumi is a Miscellaneous game, developed by AI and published by Rocket Science Games, which was released in Japan in 2003.

name: Downwordly
summary:
Downwordly is a word building game that challenges you to make the most out of the letters you have. Not all letters you see are playable! Use your intellect to find the best word you can make while also planning for the future.
Play against your GameCenter friends in turn-based multiplayer!
Play solo with an endless stack of letters!
Try searching for words in Puzzle mode!
Work your way through a new set of 5 layers of tiles every day in the Daily Challenge!
See how you stack up against your friends and the world on the leaderboards.

name: Donkey Kong 3
summary: The Modern version has a few differences. First, Mario replaces Stanley (just like how an Orange Yoshi replaces him for the Modern mode of Greenhouse in Game & Watch Gallery 3). Mario and Donkey Kong also have bubble shooters instead of insecticide sprays. Plus, the setting is a Ghost House. Lastly, the bees have been replaced by a fireball and a Boo. The fireball remains in place until pushed away by the bubbles. The Boo attempts to sneak up on either Mario or Donkey Kong when one of them is busy refilling his bubble shooter. When the fireball or Boo reaches Mario's or Donkey Kong's side, whoever receives it freaks out. Unlike in the Classic version, music is featured.

name: Doom GTS
summary:
The Grand Transitional Stages of Doom.

- Taking Doom's classic engine to the limits. Nostalgia, and everything a "Doomer" could desire (eg. a vehicle to mow down monsters, better bosses, better graphics), easter eggs included.

name: Don't Die!
summary: Prepare for a challenge of wits, reflex, and strategy, and make sure that you Don't Die!

name: Doki Doki Sweets Girlfriend
summary:
You’re a high school student that’s inherited a Japanese sweets shop. Business is slow, but one day a cute girl shows up on your doorstep saying she’s starving! You bring her inside and try to feed her some sweets, but she states he can only eat “Zunda Mochi,” a specialty of Northern Japan! You somehow manage to find some and bring it back to her and she suddenly regains her strength! She says her name is Tohoku Zunko and that if you want your business to succeed, you need to start selling... Zunda mochi!

She ends up staying with you to help your business, but things start to get a little crazy when her two sisters show up!

Will you be able to take your store to the next level with her special zunda mochi? Will you be able to unlock the secrets of their hearts?

name: Don King Boxing
summary: The most famously successful, enthusiastically coiffured promoter in all of pugilism lends his half-century of experience, wisdom, and name recognition to Prizefighter, a hardcore boxing game with a role-playing sideline designed to demonstrate the dedication and diligence demanded of heavyweight champ hopefuls, even outside of the squared circle and away from the gym. In the role of their own custom up-and-comer, players must make decisions to balance the boxer's conflicting needs. It takes training to stay sharp, but time spent at promotion may lead to bigger matches, and all work with no play can be bad for a man's mental health. Story development occurs through documentary-style updates and cut scenes. The game aims to present, in the words of its presenter himself, "a glimpse at what life is like in and out of the ring for these incredible athletes."

name: Domino Man
summary: In Domino Man, you play as the titular character. The goal is to fill all the empty trail, as indicated by the black spots on the screen, with dominoes. Once the dominoes are all lined up, the stage is complete. However, there are many obstacles that can topple all of your dominoes. Some of these enemies include shoppers, caddies in golf carts, and a large bully. In addition, there is a giant bee that constantly follows you around, but can't knock over the dominoes. Touching any of the aforementioned enemies results in the loss of a life of the player. However, some of these enemies can be dispatched by pushing them out of the way, or dispatched by other means.

name: Down the Hill!
summary: Down The Hill is a unique and fast-paced arcade game that will keep you hooked for hours. The goal of the game is to descend from an infinite hill, while avoiding many obstacles and enemies, and grabbing stars and power-ups.

name: Doug From Accounting
summary: Office themed Beat em Up

name: Dog Veterinary: Training Hospital Near Me
summary: Get ready to care for and play in Your Puppy Veterinary!

name: Dopamine
summary: Dopamine is a competitive high-speed action shooter in VR. Fly, boost-dash, and use your beams and homing lasers to rack up your points!

name: Doki Doki House
summary: Doki Doki House is a dating sim that takes place in beautiful Australia on the Gold Coast. In this game you play as the heroine, which suddenly becomes the temporary owner of a guest house. Fall in love with these characters and experience the interesting story of your very own guest house!

name: Donkey Kong Country 4
summary:
Donkey Kong Country 4 is a pirated port of Donkey Kong Country from 1994 for the SNES, made by Hummer Team in 1997.

The gameplay, graphics, and sound are similar to the official Game Boy Color port of Donkey Kong Country, albeit downgraded to work on the Famicom. It's often considered to be significantly superior to other pirates based on the Donkey Kong Country series.

name: Dogs Throwing Swords II: Three Barks to the Wind
summary: A sidescrolling bark-em-up where you create and guide a team of very good dogs to save their home!

name: Doraemon 2: Nobita no Toys Land Daibouken
summary: Doraemon 2: Nobita no Toys Land Daibouken is an Action game, developed by SAS Sakata and published by Epoch, which was released in Japan in 1993.

name: Double Dragon II: The Revenge
summary:
Technōs created once again a vastly different experience with Double Dragon II on the NES. The experience system was dropped, but the moveset still underwent a few changes. The elbow attack and turning jump kick are gone, but with the standard kick directed backwards they seemed a bit redundant anyway. There are two new ways to make enemies in a grapple suffer, elbow smashes to the head, and a high kick to propel them away. In the brief time window when the Lee brothers are crouching after a jump or after getting knocked down, it’s possible to perform a rising uppercut or a knee jump attack. The timing for these isn’t easy, but they are the most powerful moves in the game.

On the NES, Double Dragon II is a much more innovative and unique sequel than in the arcade, but it marks also the time Double Dragon started its schizophrenic shifting between wildly different tones and gameplay styles. In a way it’s one of the best games to bear the Double Dragon name, but it’s hard to shake the feeling that Technōs had already started to loose a cohesive vision of what it meant to be Double Dragon, both in tone and in gameplay.

name: Doomed Lands
summary: Doomed Lands is a survival game where the protagonist must collect, build, mine, face enemies, bosses and survive a doomed land.

name: Dooria
summary: An intricate hardcore puzzle game within a world that feels both familiar and foreign, allowing you to lust for the solution or meander without aim for a journey entirely your own.

name: Donkey Kong Country Mania
summary: Donkey Kong Country Mania is a ROM hack/mod of Donkey Kong Country that aims to mix some old and new together much like the game that inspired this hack, Sonic Mania. Some new levels and ideas are remixed with some reimaginings of levels from DK’s handheld past.

name: Donkey Kong: Coconut Crackers
summary:
Donkey Kong Coconut Crackers is a canceled puzzle game for the Game Boy Advance and a Donkey Kong spinoff title. The game was developed by Rare Ltd., and was originally planned for a November 2001 release date. It was likely postponed ahead of time due to the forthcoming acquisition from Microsoft in 2002. However, the game was eventually converted into It's Mr. Pants, released in late 2004.

Some of the planned modes included various challenges around Donkey Kong Island, challenges from Cranky Kong, and a multiplayer mode.

name: Doctor Who: The Edge of Reality - Deluxe Edition
summary: Doctor Who: The Edge of Reality - Deluxe Edition includes exclusive bonus content. Equip yourself with your favourite Sonic Screwdrivers and switch it up with multiple glove designs to solve the timey-wimey mystery in true Doctor Who style!

name: Down in the Dungeon
summary: The first game in the 1995-american-basement-simulator genre.

name: Dodge Spree X
summary:
They held you captive - Time to escape from this dreaded place!
You better get moving before they come to catch you.

name: DoomWall
summary: Hack your way through the Nex-Us in this turn-based puzzle game. You'll face obstacles like bit barriers, lasers, and digital monsters, all trying to slow you down before the DoomWall catches up and forces you out.

name: Dottie Dreads Nought
summary:
Dottie Dreads Nought is a platforming game created for the SNESDEV Game Jam 2021.

Can you help Dottie on her hiking adventure to find the legendary Edelweiß flower?

Along for the ride is her friend Ernesto. By using the magic mirror, you can shift perspective to him and reveal secrets previously hidden.

name: Dolphin Olympics
summary:
Dolphin Olympics is an awesome game of skill in which you must control and acrobatic dolphin and try to perform a variety of cool tricks! You only have a time limit of two minutes and within this time limit you must rack up a high score by trying out different tricks and landing them successfully.

Use the arrow keys to control the movement of your dolphin - build up speed underwater first before you launch out of the water and perform huge jumps. Use the down arrow to perform corkscrew spins, and use the left and right arrows to perform front and back flips. You gain points for each completed trick, and also for a perfect re-entry into the water. What high score can you register in Dolphin Olympics?

name: Dormitory Hentai Clicker
summary: Dormitory Hentai Clicker is a fascinating clicker in which you take on the role of the person in charge of running a dormitory.

name: Dolphin Paradise: Wild Friends
summary: Here, you can feed, train and create a strong bond with realistic looking dolphins and orcas. These high-resolution, animated dolphins swim and perform tricks across your screen and crave your attention at each step of the game, awaiting your commands. Learn tricks and perform Shows! Share with friends!

name: Doubumon
summary: Doubumon is an RPG monster collecting/battling game. Experience tactical battles as you choose 4 Doubumon to fight with on the battlefield. Grow, evolve, and customize your attacks while developing different strategies in order to win, as you fight and explore your way to become the Doubumon champion.

name: Double Switch
summary:
A young man named Eddie has been apparently trapped in the basement of the old apartment complex Edward Arms. The player character must venture into the complex and find out what is really happening there, at first avoiding various traps and hazards, and later learning to set them against those who harbor evil plans.

Double Switch is a "trap-'em-up" game very similar to Night Trap in gameplay and visual presentation. The player has to manipulate cameras to avoid or set traps, affecting the course of the storyline which is represented by live action movie sequences.

name: Don't Look Down
summary: Can you complete the Rite of Passage platforming trial and overcome Moki's fear of heights? Don’t Look Down is a first person platforming game with an emphasis on player movement and speedrunning potential. You play as a fantasy rabbit-humanoid character named Moki. Moki must complete a Rite of Passage trial to obtain their full wings as they progress to become an adult-like mature member of their world’s society. This trial is a challenging platforming course which requires Moki to use their base skills along with the skills they obtain along the way to prove they are worthy of wielding a full set of wings.

name: Double Damnation
summary: Kill fast. Die faster. Abuse Immortality! Together...

name: Don't Look!
summary: My MAGS entry for December 2010: "Discovery" Little Sharon is afraid of the dark, what will await her when she goes to sleep? The game is done in 32-bit color, but I did stick to an 8-bit palette. Certain effects only work with 32-bit, so using that was necessary.

name: Doll Catching Simulator
summary: In the busy life, do you long to experience the fun of catching dolls but are limited by time and space? Now, the doll catching simulator brings you a brand-new entertainment experience!

name: Doom II: Community Chest
summary: Community Chest (cchest.wad) is a 2003 megawad that contains 32 new levels, made by members of the Doomworld community. It requires a limit-removing source port to play. A sequel, Community Chest 2, was created a year later, followed by another sequel, Community Chest 3, in 2007. A third sequel, Community Chest 4, followed in 2012.

name: DooM in the Dark
summary: The space station has undergone an unknown contamination from space, the previously unknown X virus mutates, almost the entire station crew is infected, you need to stop the army of mutants before they break through to Earth and doomsday began!

name: Doraemon 3: Nobita to Toki no Hougyoku
summary: Doraemon 3: Nobita to Toki no Hougyoku is an Action game, developed by AIM and published by Epoch, which was released in Japan in 1994.

name: Doritos VR Battle
summary: The Doritos VR Battle is a highly interactive VR game based on movement and agility skills. A game you play alone or with your friends taking turns to beat each others scores. Find your way through the dark universe and use your weapons to battle the enemy.

name: Doctor Who: The Last Dalek
summary:
Based on the 2005 episode of Doctor Who "Dalek", The Last Dalek is a browser game where you play as a Dalek trying to escape the vault.
Throughout each level of the game, you slowly reacquire your abilities in preparation for facing the Doctor at the end of the game.
Developed by New Media Collective.

name: Don't Give Up the Cat
summary:
Tonight, you are out in the woods. As a cat.

A short game intended to be played at night, using headphones. In this first-person game you use your mouse to look around and scratch things, and WASD keys for walking, shift to run, and you use Esc to show the menu.

After you run you may sit around to breathe a bit and listen to the forest. Don't forget to explore around. But you may not be alone...

name: Doom Troopers: Mutant Chronicles
summary: Based on the popular role-playing and card game, Doom Troopers casts you as a fearless commando who's been commissioned to save the world from an invading force of mutants. Play as either Mitch Hunter or Max Steiner as you embark on the most important mission of your life - the complete annihilation of the Dark Legion. Work your way through eight detailed levels filled with all kinds of evil and dangerous mutants as you unload with a barrage of high-powered weapons that are readily available. If the pressure is a little too much for you to handle alone, recruit a friend and try to eliminate the Dark Legion together. The world is in grave danger and only the Doom Troopers can make things right.

name: Donald no Magical World
summary: Donald no Magical World is an Action game, developed by Sims and published by Sega, which was released in Japan in 1994.

name: Don't Shoot Yourself!
summary:
Your bullets are your own worst enemy in this never seen before puzzle SHMUP.

Avoid 100 of your bullets in a small ring as they bounce off different kinds of barriers. Skillfully control your bullet pattern to outsmart the walls and break through to the next level!

name: Doodle Jump Easter Special
summary:
Special Easter version of one of the most addictive and best-selling iOS apps of all time, Doodle Jump, with a twist - levels!
Can you complete all the 25 levels by collecting an Easter eggs at the end of each? It's trickier than it sounds thanks to all the different platform types and a few cute monsters along the way.

name: DotLine
summary:
DotLine is a challenging minimalist puzzle game.
Click on puzzle elements to drive the ball to the exit without falling into the void.
Completing the game will require fast thinking and reaction !

name: Doom
summary: The GBA port of Doom has some of the original levels missing, but has Link Cable support. The engine is based on the Atari Jaguar port, being the last version with this engine.

name: D.O.G: Fight For Your Life
summary:
D.O.G. is a third-person shooter with vehicles and turrets to use. The game doesn't have a story, you just select a mission that you can afford (you get money from completing missions), kill everyone/everything in it and continue to the next mission.

The engine uses voxels, so you can blast the ground with few different weapons, like flamethrower, chaingun, grenade launcher and rocker launcher. Picking up powerups for yourself and your vehicle ease your way on the devastation.

name: Donkey Kong
summary: The Atari 8-bit computer port of Donkey Kong was developed by Atari, Inc.

name: Double Jump 2
summary: A 2D platformer in which the number of jumps the player has is doubled after each completed level.

name: Doorman
summary: Doorman is a simulation game where you go from door to door and serve people.

name: Doctor Who: The Adventure Games
summary: Join the Doctor as his companion in an out-of-this-world adventure through time and space. You will need all your wits and courage to outsmart and defeat some of the Doctors' most storied enemies like the Daleks, Cybermen, and the Vashta Nerada. Explore the universe, and even see the inner workings of the TARDIS!

name: Donkey Kong Country: The Trilogy
summary: Donkey Kong Country: The Trilogy is a fan game made by André Productions. The game is a reimagining of the original Donkey Kong Country trilogy, with the same art style made popular by Rare. It has 40 newly designed stages and a new game mechanics not present in the original trilogy, like the rocket from Donkey Kong Country Returns.

name: Dopusk 31
summary: Once a simple and frostbitten Moscow digger, wanted to find a special place, is an old shelter to number 31, TK he climbed all the available underground location. After a long search and the Internet, the location of the object 31, in the end, he Founded Path Transportation go through the rails in the subway, through the ventilation in the subway. As soon as he got into unknown lab in his eyes happened to PE, as later proved scientists have tried to reveal the material of an unknown object, discovered recently and brought here from Antarctica.

name: Does It Shoot?
summary: Made for Ludum Dare 32. A game about a gunsmith, who crafts weapons for soldiers from junk he has and hopes it works.

name: Dokingan
summary: A vertical shoot-em-up by GOTYO.

name: Doombringer
summary: Doombringer is a free to play First Person Shooter in the Arena FPS genre.

name: Doom II: No Rest for the Living
summary: No Rest for the Living is the title of the new Doom II expansion pack developed by Nerve Software. It is also included in the Doom 3 BFG Edition.

name: Double Dragon 3: The Rosetta Stone
summary: Handheld game based on the Double Dragon III arcade game.

name: Don't Be a Hero
summary: This is a story about overcoming challenges and becoming a hero. A total of four trials await you, and you must defeat several powerful enemies in order to pass. Every battle is difficult, you must read the enemy's moves, choose the right aid, and adopt the right strategy to win.

name: Dodo Life
summary: Dodo Life is a game about a dodo that desperately tries to find the island where its species lives, avoiding as much as possible not being extinguished on the way by cruel predators in a Jurassic era.

name: Door of Perception
summary:
Doors of perception is game from castle game jam 2016. Enjoy!
Gameplay:

name: Double Dragon
summary: The Atari Lynx port of Double Dragon.

name: Dodolly Tales
summary: Take command of unique dolls with a dual personality and confront your mischievous creator.Quickly level up at every stage, unlocking a plethora of thrilling abilities that will empower you to overcome the odds and be able to free your sisters.

name: Donut Crabs
summary: Donut Crabs is a physics puzzle game. Control the platforms and guide the donut along the trajectory you set. Help the crab collect all the donuts on the island and solve the huge amount of relaxing and, sometimes, hard puzzles!

name: Double Dragon
summary: The Commodore port of Double Dragon.

name: Double Dragon
summary: The Sega Master System port of Double Dragon.

name: Double Dragon
summary: The Amstrad CPC port of Double Dragon.

name: Double Dragon
summary: The Sega Mega Drive/Genesis port of Double Dragon.

name: Don't Touch the Purple
summary: Don't Touch the Purple ("DTTP") is an endless side-scrolling arcade platformer where you make your way through a randomly generated assortment of levels and get as far as possible before dying.

name: Doge Simulator
summary: Cause havoc and destruction in a city as a shiba inu.

name: Doodle Jump Race
summary:
In celebration of Doodle Jump's fifth anniversary we've created this simple mini-game.
A tad tired of jumping, our tireless hero Doodle the Doodler grabs his favorite jetpack and joins a semi-illegal jetpack drag race through the treacherous canyons of Doodlandia with one single objective - WIN!

name: Dogfight 1942: Russia Under Siege
summary: Germany’s dominant air force is pounding at the gates of the Soviet Empire and Blitzkrieg is at full swing. It doesn't take the overwhelming Nazi force long to push the Soviets far inland, towards Moscow. Mother Russia is chilled to the bone as winter wreaks havoc all across the land. The Soviet Empire is at its knees. Become Russia’s bravest and fight fiercely over the vast skies of the Motherland: free Leningrad, reign fire over Kursk and drop explosive greetings from Russia on Berlin.

name: Does not Commute
summary: A strategic driving game from the maker’s of Smash Hit.

name: Don't Call Me Skyfish
summary: A sequel to the Xbox Live platformer, Call Me Skyfish. This game once again features Skyfish in his quest to get rid of his enemies.

name: Dogot Games
summary: Mini-game collection! You are a flying sleepy owl who are trying to not be hit by bad birds. Try to react at really good timing and survive! Or you play as a gray dot who needs to collect foods as fast as you can while solving fun puzzles so as not to fail the level. And much more!

name: Do Not Feed the Monkeys 2099: Four Cage Gourmet Pack
summary: Welcome to the future of the Primate Observation Club. In this second DLC called "Two Cage Seasoning Pack", spy on strangers through four new security cameras, invade their privacy, and uncover their secrets in this digital voyeur simulator.

name: Doodle Baseball
summary: An arcade-style baseball game Google Doodle released in the US for July 4th.

name: Do Not Feed the Monkeys 2099: Two Cage Seasoning Pack
summary: Arriving on December 13th, this 1st DLC will be absolutely FREE!

name: Doctor Who Infinity: The Horror of Flat Holm
summary: The Horror of Flat Holm, penned by the multi-talented Mike Collins (who drew The Dalek Invasion of Time), is drawn by Patrick Goddard and colored by John-Paul Bove. It is an epic U.N.I.T. story told in several time periods with the Fourth Doctor joined by Captain Mike Yates (voiced of course by Richard Franklin) and with modern day...

name: Dominions 6: Rise of the Pantokrator
summary: In Dominions 6 you take control of a powerful being that rules a nation and aspires to godhood. The type of Pretender Gods can vary from magically powerful arch mages to old dragons or an enormous tree. Dominions is a deep 4x turn based strategy game with a very large variety of spells and units.

name: Don Quixote: A Dream in Seven Crystals
summary:
Don Quixote wakes from a nightmare about the destruction of the kingdom of Trapobana. Deciding to pursue the dream, he leaves to rescue the Princess Dulcinea and return the seven crystal balls that govern the kindgom.

This RPG is a first-person dungeon crawler with exploration and combat in the traditional Wizardry style. It makes extensive use of the LaserActive's hardware, with all conversations and even in-battle combat animations using laserdisc FMV with traditional animation.

name: Dora Moji: Nobita no Kanji Daisakusen
summary: Master the correct hiragana, katakana, and kanji with Dora Moji: Nobita no Kanji Daisakusen, released in 2015.

name: DoomAI
summary: Kind of DOTA game, experience the adventure experience of ai zi and hu together during the game. If you are a fan of casual games, then you must not miss.

name: Doctor Nanobot
summary: A microbiology themed retro shoot-em-up.

name: Doggo Dungeon
summary: Jump, Bark, Bite & Sniff your way through unique hand crafted pixel levels in this doggo dungeon action RPG! Misha's boy Ben has gone missing. She climbs into the well where he was last seen and enters a fantastical world biting off more than she can chew. Level up, clash with monsters, find secrets and clues to where your boy went. Along the way meet ghosts, goblins, a royal frog queen, and other strange things in your search for your lost friend.

name: Dolucky no Kusayakiu
summary:
Neco Dolucky is a cool cat from New York City. He enjoys soul music and dancing, and loves nothing more than a cool, refreshing Coca Cola Classic. One day he and his other animal friends were bored, so they decided to start a baseball league. One can assume their sponsor is the Coca Cola Corporation... Suddenly, they receive a challenge via telegram from the "Tab Clear Empire Hellthunder Destroyers!" Of course they can't back down, that wouldn't be TOUGH. Fight on through baseball, boys!

Lead The Coca Cola Doluckies to victory!

name: Donkey Kong
summary: The Amstrad CPC port of Donkey Kong was developed by Ocean Software.

name: Down Word
summary: Create four letter words with falling tiles before the screen fills. Utilize powerups and careful preparation to create multiple words at once to achieve multiplier bonuses!

name: DoudingMan
summary: This is a defensive shooter Roguelite game where enemies will be coming from the right side in an endless stream and you need to survive for a limited time to get through. If you can keep the goods on the left intact, all the better.

name: Doom 3: BFG Edition
summary: The BFG Edition features enhanced graphics, better audio with more horror effects, a checkpoint save system, and support for 3D displays and HMDs. The game also includes the previous expansion Resurrection of Evil and a new single-player expansion pack called The Lost Mission. Additionally, it includes copies of the original Doom (the Ultimate Doom edition with the add-on fourth episode, "Thy Flesh Consumed"), and Doom II with the expansion No Rest for the Living, previously available for the Xbox 360. The BFG Edition also features the ability to use the flashlight while holding a weapon, in the form of the so-called armor-mounted flashlight.

name: Donkey Xote
summary: Enjoy this original adventure game hand in hand with its main characters. With your PlayStation 2 find out all the details of the Donkey Xote story. Play with Sancho, Rucio and Don Luixote himself and discover sheer enjoyment all the way.

name: Don't Let Her In
summary: a short body horror story about being alone.

name: Double Dribble
summary: The NES port of Double Dribble, the second basketball arcade game by Konami, following Super Basketball.

name: Downtown Nekketsu Dodgeball
summary: Downtown Nekketsu Dodgeball gives you exciting dodgeball. In this dodgeball you fight until the other party is downed. Plays with easy operation and variegated action.

name: Don't Talk to Strangers
summary: You are a kid that loves candy. You just arrived in a new city with your family. And it’s Halloween.

name: Doom 2 Reloaded
summary:
Doom 2 Reloaded (D2RELOAD.WAD) is a 2009 megawad designed by Andy Stewart (eschdoom). Most of the 32 levels contained are vanilla-compatible, but errors could appear at a few points while using the original executable, so it is better to play through a limit removing source port; another reason is that additional graphics are present. Almost all of the maps could be played in deathmatch or cooperative mode.

A DeHackEd patch is used to change the levels' names and par times.
